180b6(mdo): bar lung stond par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi 'thil du myi sdang bar 'gyur ro// ya dgas su skya bar lung stend par bzhad na ni/ dud 'gror skye bar lung stond par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi rting bar myi snang bar 'gyur/ 
180b7(mdo): midags su skye bar lung stond par bzhed na ni 'bas kyi 'tha bor myi snang bar 'gyur ro// phyir ste bar srung so da par bzhed de/ pus mo gnyis su kyi snang bar 'gyur ro// spobs kyi 'dza
180b8(mdo): rlung ba'i rgyal por skye ba lung ban par 'a'ad de/ byag gsod pa'i zil du gyi snang bar 'gyur / 'a'adu 'i sbyar pa'i rgyal por skye bar lung pod pa'i gagad na/ bya gsas pa'i sa du kyi
181a1(mdo): par 'gyur ro// lngar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar myi snang bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi byang chub tu skye bar lu bston par bzhed na ni/ zhal du myi snang bar 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par
181a2(mdo): bzhed na ni/ smin 'tshams kyi mdzod spur myi snang bar 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byeng chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ dbu'i phyag tu myi sna nga bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das
181a3(mdo): lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i rtseg tu myi snang bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa mtshon snga stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can
181a4(mdo): mang po zhal gi sgo nas byung bar gyur// de'i sa phyogs rnams su na tu snang bar bgyis// nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhi ma// yang tshigs su bcad de gsol dpa/ rgod pa dang bral/ 
181a5(mdo): zhing rgyags dang myi dges spangs pa yi// sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag/ ki dam pa'i rgyur gyu rang pa// rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma ma ches par// pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum myi ston// brtan
181a6(mdo): po nyid kyi blo'i se dus bab mkhyen lags ma// dge sbyong rgyal dbang som nyi 'chal ba rnams// thub pa khyu mchog gyi ni gsu pa mchog brtan pa dang // bzang po dag gi sa the tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol// rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur
181a7(mdo): brtan pa'i// mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyin da 'dzum myi ston// gang ga don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa// de ni khyod las skye bo rtsal chen nyan par 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal stsa lad pa/ kun dga' bo de ni
181a8(mdo): de bzhin no// de ni de bzhin de/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu rkye byed par 'dzum pa kyi mdzad do// kun dga' bo dang dpon 'dis pa la 'di lta bu'i bkur
181b1(mdo): spyi byas pa mtho ba ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so// kun dka' bo ded dpon 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su rtong pa 'dis/ bskal pa kra rus myed pa gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrub par bye/ 
181b2(mdo): pabapa'i bye du chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/ sta brje chen pos yongs su bsgos pali/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhidapa/ ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsuM
181b3(mdo): dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa la sangs rgyas spos mchog ces bya bar gyur na te// 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni/ gang bal sems mngon par dga' bar gyurd pa 'di
181b4(mdo): yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsalang nas/ dge skyong de dag yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon pastod do// / zla ba zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas
181b5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das la ni rgyal po rnams dang / blon po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor kau mya rnams dang / tshong dpon rnaMs dang/ ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod
181b6(mdo): sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lnga pa rnams dang / mya 'am ci rnams dang / ltom phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma
181b7(mdo): ya ni dang / nam mkha' ldi padang/ mya 'am ci dang / lto ma phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bsod nams dang ldan pa/ na bzal dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / ba dan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman
181b8(mdo): zo rnams bsnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon myad zas sbyin gi kun dag lang na bzhugs so// de nas mnyan du yod pa na tha ga zla ba zhes bya ba dbul
182a1(mdo): zhing shin tu dbul ba zhig gnas so// de yang las ci tsam zhig byed pa de tsam nyi tshe'i zin rnyed par zad de/ des cung zad kyang gzhag tu byed do// de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni 'jig rten pha rol nas kyang
182a2(mdo): bsod nams ma byas par 'dir 'ongs la/ 'dir yang dge bar myi byed pas/ 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu yang ma bya song nis ma byas/ dge ba yang ma byas 'jigs shing skrag pa'i mgon skyabs kyang ma byas par 'gro dgos
182a3(mdo): srad kyis// bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la sna 'ag zhig gis mchod pa bya gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas des khyim bdag gzhan zhig kau ras btags nas/ des de la sa ras kyi tsher tshar khyer te srang du zhugs so// ka bcom ldan
182a4(mdo): 'das kyang snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol da na ste/ lhung ba zed bsnams nas/ mnyan du yod par bsod snyom la gshegs so// de nas de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku mtshan suM pucu gnyis kyis legra/ 
182a5(mdo): bar brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgya cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom ka bsr-i be rkye nad pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i'odo ma ngal @/ rin po che ler ba 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bza ba mthong ngo // mthong
182a6(mdo): nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dka' bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bde dag la phan gdags pa'i byor nyid kyi chos gos ra yod pa bstan to// de nas des ras kyi char cha med dag bcom ldan 'das la
182a7(mdo): phul lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de li mod la chos gos srubs par stan to// de nas de rgya cher dga' ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ smon lam btab pa/ sbyin pa chung la zhi ba
182a8(mdo): ni rgya che ste/ mthu chen khyod nyid thugs su chud par bas/ sbyin pa chen por gyu rad pa 'di yis ni// bdag ni ske chen grags pa'i sangs rgyas sho ka/ sbyin pa 'di na chung ngu lags kyis kyang // bdag gis sems ni ra ba yangs dpag yas ste/ 
182b1(mdo): myi dang lta mchog rgyal bas bzhes na ni// sbyin brgyang yang 'bras bu chen por gyur da// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ khyod ni phyi mar zhi ba mthu che ba// sgra chen grags pa myi dang lhas mchod pa/ rang byung 'jig rten
182b2(mdo): phan pa snying zer ldan tshar tshar bla ma zhes bya ba'i rgyal bar gyurang // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tha ka pa zla ba'i rgyu gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa dang // lam gcig tu rgyud pa mkhyend nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs
182b3(mdo): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de// de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'dra dza / kha cig ni steng
182b4(mdo): du 'gro'o// 'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig naka dang / bsdus 'a/ joms dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang rab tu
182b5(mdo): tsha ba dang mnar myed pa dang / chu bung can dang / chu burd dang / so thams thams dang / kye hud zer dang / a chu zer dang / ud pa la ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa dang / 
182b6(mdo): pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/ tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyu rang te 'bab bo// grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyu ra te 'bab po
182b7(mdo): des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams che zhil bar 'gyur ro// de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'ond te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo// de nas de
182b8(mdo): dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das phrul pa 'byed pa mdzad de/ de dag gis sru lad pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur pa la gzhan du yang
183a1(mdo): ma skyes mod kyi 'o nad kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus// bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnam par che zhi bar gyur to snyam mo/ de nas de dag sruld pa la sems mngon par dka'
183a2(mdo): bar gyur nas sems can dmyal ba myong bar gyu rad pa'i las de zad de/ lha dang myi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying 'tshams 'dzind par 'gyur ro// steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de
183a3(mdo): dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang / sum bcu pa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab 'bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rdzas
183a4(mdo): dang tshangs pa mdun na 'dond pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po/ rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad myed 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge' chung rnams dang / tshad myed dge'
183a5(mdo): rnams dang / dge' rgyas rnams dang / sprin myed rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / myi che ba rnams dang / myi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba rnams
183a6(mdo): dang shi nad tu mthong ba rnams dang / 'og myin gi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/ myi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang bdag myed pa'i sgra sgrogs so// tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang brjod par byed de// nges
183a7(mdo): par 'byung ba cham par gyis/ sangs rgyas stan la sbyor bar gis 'dam bu'i khyim la klang chen bzhin 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gis// gang zhig chos 'dul ba 'di nyid la// bag yod spyod par byed pa
183a8(mdo): ni/ skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas// sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/ zhes brjod par byed do// de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend gi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das
183b1(mdo): kyis 'das pa'i las lung stond par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su myi snang bar 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i lung stond par bzhed na ni/ mdun logs su myi snang bar 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal bar skye bar
183b2(mdo): lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi 'thil du kyi snang bar 'gyur ro// dud 'gror skye bar lung stond par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par myi snang bar 'gyur ro// yi dgas su skye bar lung stond par bzhed na ni zhabs gi 'the bor
183b3(mdo): myi snang bar 'gyur ro// stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung stond par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yod pa'i 'thil du myi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung stond par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i 'thil
183b4(mdo): du myi snang bar 'gyur ro// lhar skye bar lung stonod par bzhed na ni lte bar myi snang bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung stond pa ra bzhed na ni/ zhal du myi snang bar 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas
183b5(mdo): kyi byang chub tu lung stond par bzhed na ni sbyin 'tshams kyi mdzod spur myi snang bar 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung stond par bzhed na ni/ dbu'i tsug tor du myi
183b6(mdo): snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du myi snang bar gyurd to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar da te/ 
183b7(mdo): bcom ldan 'das zhus la tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can mang po zhal ki sgo nas byung bar gyurang // de'i sa phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis// nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin yang
183b8(mdo): tshigs su bcad de gsol dpa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang myi dges spangs pa'i// sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gis dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa / rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/ pad ma'i cha dang dung mngon
184a1(mdo): lta bu'i 'dzum kyi stonang // brten pos nyid kyi blos yis dus bab mkhyend lags na/ dge' spyong rgyal dbang nyan pasdom nyi 'tshal pa rnams// thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtand pa dang
184a2(mdo): bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol// rgya mtsho la dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa'i// 'gon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyi nad 'dzum myi stond// gang gi don tu dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ de ni
184a3(mdo): khyod la skye bo phal tshen nyan par 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ kun dga' bo de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
184a4(mdo): rnams niH/ rgyu myed rkyend myed par 'dzum pa myi mdzad do// kun dka' bo tha ga pa zla ba 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i sti byas pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so// kun dga' bo tha ga pa zla ba 'di dge' ba'i tsha ba dang / 
184a5(mdo): sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis bskal pa grangs myed pa gsum gis yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/ snying rje chen pos yongs su bskos pa'i
184a6(mdo): pha rol tu phyind pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
184a7(mdo): rgyas tshar tshar bla ma zhes bya bar gyur te/ 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang ba la sems mngon par dga' bar gyu rad pa 'di yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
184a8(mdo): 'ad sa/ dge' grong de dag yi rangs sa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bzod do// ba zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang/ 
184b1(mdo): tshwad pa men pa rnams dang / blag po rnams dang / bzangs 'dag kyi ma pa dang / 'od dpa rnams dang / dad pon rnams dang / la rnams dang / blarnams dang / gnad sbyid rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams pa
184b2(mdo): nam mkha' lding rnams dang / myi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam/ 
184b3(mdo): mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang
184b4(mdo): snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge' 'dun dang bcas pa/ mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal kyi tshe la/ khyim bdag mgo ni myed zas sbyin kyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe mnyan du
184b5(mdo): yod pa na tshong dpon gi bu che 'u zhig gnas so// de yang khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa shas che ba zhig ste/ rdzogs byed la gatshogs pa stond pa drug la mchod pa byed do// de phyis nad tshabs chen po zhig gis thebs te
184b6(mdo): sman pa dang / sman dang / nad g.yog myed de/ shi la gtugs nas 'di snyam du bsams te/ da ni bdag sdug bsngal bar gyur pa'i skabs byed pa 'am/ srog 'phangs pa sbyin par byed pa sangs rgyas pa yin/ 
184b7(mdo): pa gzhan su zhig yod snyam mo// de nas de ltar bsams nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs so// dani sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis myi mkhyen pa'am/ myi gzigs pa 'am/ mya rtogs
184b8(mdo): pa 'am/ thugs su myi rgyad pa ci yang myed la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa/ gcig tu dpa' ba zla myed pa/ 
185a1(mdo): gnyis su myi gsung ba/ zhi ga nas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/ rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsum la legs pa slabs pa/ 'dul ba'i gzhig suM la mkhas pa/ rgya bo bzhi las
185a2(mdo): rgal pa/ rdzu 'phrul ka rkang pa bzhi la nabs shi nang tu brtan pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas nas/ myi 'jigs pa bzhis myi 'jigs pa/ khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra sgrogs
185a3(mdo): yan lag lnga rnam par sa/ ngas pa/ 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ga ma
185a4(mdo): tog gyis phyag pa/ lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/ mthar kyis granas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/ stobs bcu'i ste rabs dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa/ @
185a5(mdo): phrag bcu la dbang byed pa bas kyang ba ches khyad par tu 'phags pa/ rna mas ni/ chos nyid kyis nyid dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi sbyin kyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ mu ni sung / su ni dang / 
185a6(mdo): su ni 'phongs shong 'dug/ su ni nyam pa bar gyur da/ su ni 'phongs pa dang / nyam nga ba dang gnod pa ldan/ su ni ngan song tu gzhol/ su ni ngan song du 'bab/ mu ni nges ngan song na sa phyung ste/ mtho ris dang tha rad pa
185a7(mdo): pa dang 'bras bu dpal gzhag par bya/ su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam tu bying ba la lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni 'phags pa'i nor btun myed pa las/ 'phags pa'i nor bdun gi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/ su naM
185a8(mdo): dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su sbyin par bya/ su ni yongs su sbyin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa la 'jug
185b1(mdo): 'dir smras pa/ rgya mtsho rgya srin rnams kyi gnas// dus drabs yol bar 'gyur yang srad// gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la// sangs rgyas tus las yol ba myed// de nas bcom ldan 'a/ 
185b2(mdo): kyis khyim bdag gi pu che ba'i gnas skabs de gzigs nas/ 'od zer gser gi kha dog can nyi ma stong gi 'od pas lhag pa dag bkye ste/ de dag gis khyim de kun tu snang bar byas so// bskal pa stong du yongs su bsgos
185b3(mdo): ba'i byams pa'i 'od zer dag kyang bkye ste/ de dag gis de'i lus la phog ma thag tu mod du sim par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i sgo khang du gshegs nas/ sgo srungs kyi mis bcom ldan 'das sgo na bzhugs/ 
185b4(mdo): so// zhes de la sbran no// de nas bcom ldan 'das tshong dpon gi bu che ba dga' bar gyu rad te/ dbugs myi phyin pa dbugs pAr bya rad nas/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa legs so// bcom ldan
185b5(mdo): 'das nang tu gshegs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal ma thong bar 'tshal lo// zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das nang tu gshegs bdan pa shams pa la bzhugs so// bzhugs
185b6(mdo): nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis che ba la bka' stsal pa/ che ba khyod la gnod pa ci zhog yod/ ches pas gsol pa/ bdag la lus kyi gnod pa dang / sems kyi gnod pa mchis so// de nas bcom ldan 'dra/ 
185b7(mdo): kyis de la sems can thams cad la byams pa'i gdam dgra bstan te/ 'di ni khyod kyi sems kyi sdug bsngal gi gnyen po yin no// zhes bka' stsa lad to// de nas 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed de// kye ma lha'i dang
185b8(mdo): po brgya byin gi sa ri spos kyi ngan lnga las/ sman ga sho ra ka khyer te 'ongs na legs so snyam tu dgongs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das thugs bskyed pa'i mo la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gis ri spos kyi ngad ldang las sman
186a1(mdo): ka shi ri ka blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la phul lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang nyid kyi phyag tu bzhes nas che ba la byin te/ 'di ni khyod kyi lus kyi sdug bsngal tsha bar zhi bar byed pa yin
186a2(mdo): no zhes bka' saH lang to// de nas des lus dang / sems shin tu sbyangs pa'i bde ba thob nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur to/ sems dka' bar gyur nas/ rgyal po gsal
186a3(mdo): rgyal ba la snang de/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dgel 'dun dang btsam pa bshos gsol nas/ 'brum ri ba'i dbaza' phul te/ mchog dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng ba thams cad kyis kyang sa cang
186a4(mdo): pa byas so// de nas sems la nus par byas te/ nad lam btab pa/ dge' ba'i rtsa pa dang / sems bcu/ da pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis
186a5(mdo): ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bla na myed pa'i sman pa'i rgyal pos bdag gsos pa bzhin du/ bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i sa ma 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa myed cing yongs su 'dren
186a6(mdo): pa myed par sems can ma rgal ba rnams sgrol ba dang / ma 'grol ba rnams 'gro lad pa dang / dbugs myi phyind pa rnams dbugs 'byind pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams
186a7(mdo): yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs rgyas su gyu rad cig ces byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis che ba'i rgyu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mkhyend nas/ 
186a8(mdo): 'jam pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang dgan
186b1(mdo): rnams byur nas/ kha cig ni 'og tu 'gre'o// kha cig na steng tu 'gro'o// 'og tu 'gro'i gang yin pa de dag ni dmyal ba yas sos dang / thag nag dang / bsdus 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang
186b2(mdo): rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar myed pa dang/ chu pu ra can dang / chu bur rdo la dpa/ so tha ma tha ma dang / kyi hud zer dpa/ a rgya zer dang/ ud pal ltar gas pa da / pad ma ltar gas pa dang / bad pa ltar gas pa chen po dang / 
186b3(mdo): tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur da te 'bab bo// grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dri bor gyu rang te 'bab po// de nas sems can de dag gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse
186b4(mdo): gzhil bar 'gyur ro// de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye / de bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/ de nas de dag dad pa skyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa
186b5(mdo): 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam tu sem sa te/ kye bdag cag ni 'odi nas shi 'phom par yang ma gyu rad la/ gzhan tu yang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang spo ma byung ba'i sems
186b6(mdo): can snang ba 'di'i mi zhus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse gzhil bar gyur da to snyam mo// de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyurd nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las
186b7(mdo): de zad dang / lha dang myi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying 'tshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro// steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi la ngas kyi lha rnams dang / sum bcu
186b8(mdo): rtsa gsuM pa rnams dpa'athab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'o'i tun 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnaMs dang / 
187a1(mdo): 'od chub rnams dang / tshad myed 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad myed dag rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sman myed rnams dang / bsod na ma skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams/ 
187a2(mdo): dang / myi che ba rnams dang / myi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom sna rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og myin gi lha rnams kyi nang du song nas/ myi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag myed pa'i sgra sgrogs
187a3(mdo): so// tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang brjod par byed do// nges par 'byung ba rtsam par gyis// sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis// 'dam bu'i khyim na klang chen bzhin// 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis// gang zhig chos 'dul pa
187a4(mdo): 'di nyid la// bag yod spyod par byed pa ni// skye ba'i 'khor ba rab sa das nas// sdug bsngal zad par byed par gyur te// zhes brjod par/ byed do// de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum go steng chen po'i 'dzi
187a5(mdo): rten go khams bskor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phye bzhin 'brangs te/ gal te bco ma ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung stond par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snga ma lcogs su mya snang bar gyu rang ngo to// ma 'ongs
187a6(mdo): pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ mdun logs su myi snang bar myi 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal ba skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi 'thil tu myi snang bar 'gyur ro// hud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ 
187a7(mdo): zhabs kyi gting bar myi sdang bar 'gyur ro// yang dgas su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyo 'the bor myi snang bar 'gyur ro// myir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ pus mo gnyis su myi snang bar 'gyur ro// stobs kyi
187a8(mdo): 'khor long bsten par bzhad na na/ sbyar ba'i rgyal por skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i 'thil tu myi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i 'thil tu myi
187b1(mdo): snang bar 'gyur ro// lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na na lta bar mya snang bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung stond par bzhed na na/ dbu'i rtug tu myi snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'dra
187b2(mdo): la lan gsum bya skor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu liphya ga tor tu myi snang bar gyu rad to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dgal pos thal mo sbyar da te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can// ma pa
187b3(mdo): po zhal ki sgo nas bya bar gyur na// de'i sa phyogs rnams kun tu sdang bar bgyis// nyi me shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin// yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang myi dgas spangs pa'i// sangs rgyas 'gro ba
187b4(mdo): dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyu rad pa// rgyal ba dgra thul rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par // pad ma'i rtse dang nyung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum myi ston// brtan po nyid kyis blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na// dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi
187b5(mdo): 'tshal ba rnams// thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pas// bzang po/ ngag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol// rgya mtsho dpa ni rgyal lha bur brtan pa'i// 'gon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyin 'dzum myi ston// 
187b6(mdo): gang gi don tu dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa// de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
187b7(mdo): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu myed rkyen myed par 'dzum pa myi mdzad do// kun dga' bo khyim pa dag gi bu che ba 'das pa la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mtho ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so// kun dkal po khyim bdag gi bu
187b8(mdo): ba 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis// bskal pa grangs myed gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/ rje chen pos yang dag par sgos
188a1(mdo): pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ stobs bcu dpa / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / madren pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shakakya
188a2(mdo): thub pa zhes bya bar gyur da te 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de'i skyon pa bya ba'i chos ni de la sems mngon par gyur pa 'di yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan
188a3(mdo): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par stod do// / pad ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gi myi rnams dang / tshong
188a4(mdo): dpon rnams dang // ded dpon rnams dang / smrarnams dang / klunams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lA ma yin nams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams drang / kyi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ 
188a5(mdo): bla mar byas/ ri mo byas pa mchod pa byas te/ khwa dang / klu dang / gan d+ha can dang / lha ma yin dang // nam mkha' lding dang / myi'amaci dang / lto bye chen po rnams kyis mchod ci shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
188a6(mdo): 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ nam bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims chad pa/ bdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman thobarnams skyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi chal
188a7(mdo): khyim bdag mgon byed zas sbyin gi kun dkal lan bzhugs so// gang gis bcom ldan 'das 'jog rten tu 'byung ba'i sngon po lan na/ rgyal po gsal rgyal lha gzhan dag la tus gsum rgyas so sa me tog dang / bdug pa dang ga sos la
188a8(mdo): me tog 'breng dang / byug pa rnams kyis brjed par byed do// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung nas ni/ gzho nu lta bu'i mdo'odapes// rgyal po 'am la rgyal btul nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed de/ dga'a'
188b1(mdo): yid bde ba skyes nas/ tus gsum du bcom ldan 'das kyi thad tu 'gro zhing / mar me dang / btug pa dang / me tog dang / spos dang / me tog 'breng dang / byag pa rnams kyis mchod par byed do// de nas re shi ka na kun dka' ba ba'i srungs ma zhig/ 
188b2(mdo): gis me tog pad ma gsar du byung ba zhig khyer te/ rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi thad tu mnyan du yod par song ba dang / mu stegs can gi dge snyen zhig gis mthong nas/ kye ma pha gi pad ma 'o ni 'tshong ngam zhes dris so// de na re 'tshong ngo zhes zer ro// 
188b3(mdo): de nyon 'dod pa las re shig na khyim bdag mgon myed zas sbyin der phyin te/ des de las rin nyis 'gyur du bskyed nas/ de gnyis phan tshun gtod da 'bum 'gyur gyi bar du bskyed do// de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma 'di snyam du sems te/ 
188b4(mdo): khyim pa dag mgon myed zas sbyin 'di ni/ rgod pa can ma yin te/ 'di la ni don zhig yod gor ma chag snyam nas/ de the tsom skyes te/ mu stegs can la dka' ba'i myo dI/ da la dris pa/ khyod kyis su'i don tu 'di ltar skyed par byed/ des smras pa/ nga ni
188b5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das sred myed kyi bu'i phyir skyed par byed do// 'gon myed zas sbyin gi/ sa smras pa/ nga ni bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyis don tu skyed par byed do// kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma smras pa/ sangs rgyas shes bya ba ni su yin/ de nA
188b6(mdo): mgon myed zas sbyin gis de la sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgyas par bshad do// de nas kun dgal ba pa'i srungs mas/ mgon myed zas sbyin la smras pa/ khyim bdag pa nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das de la mchod pa bya'o// de nas khyim bdag mgon myed zas sbyin gyis
188b7(mdo): kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma de khrid de/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma des bcom ldan 'das kyi sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan suM bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe' byad bzang po brgya cus mdzes par
188b8(mdo): byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma des/ pad ma de bcom ldan 'das la bor ro// de nas po
189a1(mdo): ma thag tu pad ma de shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam du gyur da te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi steng na 'dug go// de nas kun dga' ba'i grangs ma des cho 'phrul de mthong nas sdong 'om pa nas bcad pa bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la bya
189a2(mdo): 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te/ sems la rtas par byas nas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa myed cing yongs su 'dren pa
189a3(mdo): myed par/ sems can ma rgal ba rnams sgrol ba dang / ma grol ba rnams 'brel pa dang / dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs rgyas su gyu ra da cig ces
189a4(mdo): byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma de phyu gcig nas gcig rgyud pa dang / las gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pasakhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnas sa
189a5(mdo): gi che/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas/ kha cig n-i 'og tu 'gro'o// kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o// 'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de
189a6(mdo): dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / 'dus 'joms dang / dra 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / cha ba dang / rab tu ma dang / mnar myed pa'i dang / chu bu can dang / rgya bur rtol dang / so thos thams dang / kyi hud zer/ 
189a7(mdo): dang / a rgya zer dang / ud pal ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa chen po song nas/ cha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil ba gyur date bab po// grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin/ 
189a8(mdo): pa de dag tu ni dri bar gyur da te 'bab po/ de nas sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rtse gzhil bar gyu rad to// de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ci 'di bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'o nad te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo// 
189b1(mdo): de nas de dag dang bskyed pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad do// de dag gi sprul pa mthong nas// de 'di snyam tu sems te/ kye ci bdag cag ni 'di nas shi 'phos par ma gyur da la/ gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma
189b2(mdo): sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/ Sho uH bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams me zhil bar gyu rad to snyam mo// de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur da nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las
189b3(mdo): di'ang de/ lha dang myi rnams kyi nang tu gang bya ba dad pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba deng nying 'tshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro// steng tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi la rig gi lha rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsuM ba rnams dang / 
189b4(mdo): 'thab bral dang dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dka' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnaMs
189b5(mdo): dang / tshad myed 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge rgyang rnams dang / tshad myed dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprini mye de rnams dang / bsod nas skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / 
189b6(mdo): myi che ba rnams dang / myi gtung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og myin ga lha rnams kyi nang du song nas/ myi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang bdag myed pa'i sgra sgrogs so// tshig
189b7(mdo): su gnyis kyang brjod par byed de// nges par 'byung ba rtsam par gyis// sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis// 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin// 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis// gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ bas
189b8(mdo): yod spyod par byed pa ni// skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ sug bsngal zad par byed 'gyur/ shes brjod par byed do// de nas 'od zer de dag gis/ stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams bskor nas/ bcoM ldan 'das/ 
190a1(mdo): nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brangs te/ ka lad te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung stond par bzhed na ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi skam logs su myi snang bar 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i lam lung ston par/ 
190a2(mdo): bzhed na ni/ mdun logs su myi snang bar 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal bar lung ston par bzhed da ni// zhabs kyi 'jol du myi snang bar 'gyur ro// du 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ 'bas kyi rtib par myi snang bar 'gyur ro// 
190a3(mdo): yi dgas su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi 'che bor gyi snang bar 'gyur ro// phyir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ pus mo gnyis su gyi snang bar 'gyur lo/ stobs kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na
190a4(mdo): niphyag g.yon pa'i 'thil tu gyi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'khor lo sgyur brgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i 'thil tu myi sa dang bar 'gyur lo// lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ lte bar phye/ 
190a5(mdo): myi snang bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na na/ zhal du myi snang bar 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston/ bar bzhed na ni/ smin 'tshams kyi mdzod spur myi snang bar 'gyur ro// 
190a6(mdo): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/ dbu'i tsug tor tu myi snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i tsur to// 
190a7(mdo): myi snang bar gyurd to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can// mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur // de'i sa phyogs rnams kun snang bar
190a8(mdo): bgyis// nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin// yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang myi dge spang pa'i// sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur da ba// rgyal po dgra thul rnams ni s+ya rkyen ma mchis pa/ 
190b1(mdo): pad ma'i tha dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'artum myi ston// rtan po nyid kyi blo yis tus bab mkhyen lags na// dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'chal ba rnams// thub pa khyu mchog kin gsung mchog brten pa dang // bzang po dag sri
190b2(mdo): the tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol// rgyamamong pani rgyal lta bu'i brtan pa'i// 'gon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams 'dzum gyi ston // gang gi don tu dpal bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa// de ni khyod las skye bo bal cher nyan par 'chal// 
190b3(mdo): mas ldan 'das rtsos pa sas dpa/ kun dga' ba drog de bzhin to// do du / dga' ba de bdin gshegs pa ma thams yang dag pa das pa cos sa ni mya can byed par 'dus
190b4(mdo): mdzad do// kun dga' bo kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma 'dis la 'di/ bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so// kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma 'di dge ba'i che ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / 
190b5(mdo): sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/ bskalang pa grangs myed pa/ srogs yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i byang chub yang bdag par bsgrubs te/ snying rje chen pos yongs su smos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs
190b6(mdo): su rdzogs par byas nas/ stobs bcu dpa/ myi 'jigs pa bzhid pa/ ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gsum dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas par ma bla ma zhes bya bar gyur da te/ 'jig rten du 'byung ba
190b7(mdo): 'gyur ro// de'i skyon par bya ba'i chos no// gang nga la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur da pa 'di yon no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bkalas lad te/ dge slong de dag yi rengs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par stod
190b8(mdo): do// // pan tsa la zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor lo mye rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / 
191a1(mdo): klu rnams ka/ gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / gyi 'am cirna mas dang / so 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas// ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas/ 
191a2(mdo): rA te/ zhwa dang / klu dang / mnod sbyin dang / lham yin dang / nam mal lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto'aphye cheran po rnams kyis mchod kyi shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bam yang
191a3(mdo): zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / 'das dang / btsun gsos dang / snamathong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thob kyi dge' 'dus dang bcas pa/ mnyan du song pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi sa/ khyim padag 'dod myed pa
191a4(mdo): snying gi kun dgal pan bzhug so// de'i ma byang phyogs kyi na rgyal rgyal po dang / lho rdzogs kyi ma rgyal mo gnyis kyi mthun pa su/ da to// denas she sa'ams rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das
191a5(mdo): la ba der song ste phyinang nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dus go// phyogs pa chog tu na nas/ bcom ldang las la ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyagis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ni chos kyi
191a6(mdo): rgyal po blan myed pa/ sems can 'phong sa me rnams la yongs su stso ba/ phan chur khod pa rnams kyi khon byang bar ma thadzad pa lags na/ byang phyogs kyi phan ma'i rgyal po 'di/ lho phyobs kyi ba sa tsa la'i rgyal po dang myi mthun te
191a7(mdo): de gnyis pa chun du skye bo mang po kha 'dos par byengs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rtse ba'i srad du/ de gnyis su yun ring po nas khon byu la ni pa mdzad du gsolang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ ko sa la'i rgyal po garma
191a8(mdo): rgyal kha cang myi gsung bA gnang ngo // de nas ko mal lo'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nar myi gsung bas gnang bar rig ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'pho bos phyag 'tshal nas/ stan las
191b1(mdo): langs te song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyin nyid kyi sde dro// sham thabs dang / chos kos dang / gsol te/ lhung zed skams nas/ ba ra na se'i phyogs kyi ka shi rnams grong khyer ga la ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/ mthar da kyis rgyu
191b2(mdo): zhing gshegs pa dang / ba ran ser byon nas/ ba ra na se na grong khyer smra ba'i ri dgas kyi nags na bzhugs so// de nas re shis na de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das padag cag gi yul tu gshegs par rig go// de nas bcom ldan 'das
191b3(mdo): kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa mngon par sprul nas/ byang phyogs kyi pan tsa la'i rgyal po skrag cing bred nas shi rta gcig zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kho na 'byang
191b4(mdo): bar 'gyur ba'i chos bstan to// des chos de thos nas bcom ldan 'ad nas kyi thad tu rab tu byung ste/ des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// / 
191b5(mdo): lho phyogs kyi pan tsa la'i la rgyal pos kyang / bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa// zla ba gsum gi bar du spyan drangs te/ zhal zla sa ro brgya dang ldan pa gsol nas/ 'bum ri ba'i nem bza' ya pa gsol
191b6(mdo): te/ smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa byed cing yongs su 'dren pa myed par/ sems can ma rgal ba rnams sgrol ba dang / 
191b7(mdo): ma grol ba rnams 'brel pa dang / dbugs myi 'byind pa rnams dbukas 'byind pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs rgyas su gyur da cig byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lo/ 
191b8(mdo): phyogs kyi pen tsa la'i rgyal po de'i/ rgyu gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa dang / las gcig nas gcig tu chud pa mkhyen de nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'od ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe/ 
192a1(mdo): 5/ zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang/ ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas/ kha cig ri seng du 'grol/ 'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ sems cad dmyal ba yang sos dang
192a2(mdo): this nag dang / 'dus 'jom dang / du 'bong dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / ma nang myed pa dang / rgya yum+b+ha dang / chu phur rdol dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / a chu zeng dang / ud pa la lwa
192a3(mdo): gas pa dang / pad ma lha gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/ cha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu bsil bar gyur da te 'brab bo// grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyurarang
192a4(mdo): te 'bab po// des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rtse gzhi la bar gyur na to// de nas de dag 'di snyam tu sems te/ kye mi bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam// snyam mo// de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ 
192a5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mtho panas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag ni 'od zhes kyang shi 'pho bar ma gyur da la/ gzhan du yang ba skyes mod kyi/ 'dod kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems
192a6(mdo): can snang ba 'di'i mthus/ bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams che 'azhol bar gyur nga tos ma mo// dadas dang nga/ srub pa la sems mngod par dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de ba dang / 
192a7(mdo): lga dang myi rnams kyi nang du bden pa rnams kyi sdod du rung bar 'gyur ba deng nying 'anams 'dzin par 'gyur ro// steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag tuni rgyal chen bzhi lo ris dang / sul bamapa su pa rnams dang / 'thab bral das
192a8(mdo): dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dka' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / 'od gsal nas dang / 
192b1(mdo): dge chung rnams dang / tshad myed dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin myed rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / myi che ba rnams dang / myi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu
192b2(mdo): mthong rnams dang / 'og myin gi lha rnams kyi nang du song nas/ myi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag myed pa'i sgra sgrogs so// tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang brjod par byed de// nges par 'byung brtsam par
192b3(mdo): gyis// sangs rgyas stan la sbyor bar gyis// 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin// 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis// ga zhig chos 'dul 'di nyi dri la// bag yod spyod par byed pa ni// skye ba 'khor rab spangs nas// 
192b4(mdo): sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur // zhes brjod par byed do// / de nas 'od zer de dag gis/ stong gsum go stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brangs te
192b5(mdo): gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung bston par bzhed na no// bcom ldan 'das kyi sngam logs su gyi snang bar 'gyur ro// ma 'ong ma pa'o las lung ston par bzhed na ni// mdun logs su myi snang bar 'gyuraro// 
192b6(mdo): sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni// zhabs kyi 'thil du myi snang bar 'gyur ro// hud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na no// zhabs kyi stong par gyi snang bar 'gyur ro// yi dgas su skye bar lung ston par bzhed
192b7(mdo): na ni/ zhabs kyi 'the bor myi snang bar 'gyur ro// myir skye bar lu ston par bzhed na ni/ pus mo gnyis su myi snang bar 'gyur ro// stobs kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yon pa'i 'thil tu myi snang / 
192b8(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag g.yas pa'i 'thil du myi sdang bar 'gyur ro// lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ lte bar myi snang bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston pa
193a1(mdo): bzhed na ni/ yal tu myi snang bar 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi bya brgyab tu lung ston par bzhed da ni/ smyod 'tshams kyi mdzod spur gyi snang bar 'gyur ro// blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lu sgom pa bzhen
193a2(mdo): na ni/ dbu'i rtsig tong tu myi sdang bar 'gyur po// de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i rtsig tong tu kyi snang bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dka' bos pa
193a3(mdo): mo sbyar da te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa// tshon snga stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can// mang po zhal gi sgo nas byung bar gyurang // phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis// nyi ma shar ba ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin// yang tshigs su
193a4(mdo): bcad de gsol pa/ kod dang bral zhing rgyags dang myi dge spang ba 'i// sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyu gyu da pa// rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par// pad ma'i rtsa dang tung mdog lta bu'i/ 
193a5(mdo): 'dzum myi ston// brtan po nyid kyis blo'is tus papa mkhyen lags no// dge sbyong rgyal dbang som nyo 'chal pa rnams// thub pa khyu mtsho gago ni zhe su mchog brtan pa dang // 'gon po rdzogs sangs rgyas nas/ 
193a6(mdo): kyin du 'dzum myi ston// gang gi ngos dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa// de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa kun dag 'od ni de bzhin no// de ni de bzhin te kun dka' bo de
193a7(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu dang rkyen myed par 'dzum pa myi mdzad do// kun dka' bo panas la'i rgyal po 'das pa la bkur sti 'di lta bu byas pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong las
193a8(mdo): kun dga' bo pan tsha la'i rgyal po 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su rtong pa 'dis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par sgrub par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/ snying rje chen
193b1(mdo): pos yongs su bsgos pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye b.ru gsum dang/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos mchog
193b2(mdo): ces bya bar gyur da te/ 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su ni ga pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur da pa 'di yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' su lad nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs/ 
193b3(mdo): te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // bam / 'dug pa zhes bya ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rgyal po nas
193b4(mdo): dadag blon po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brab 'khor gau mye rnam sa dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dpo/ gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha'
193b5(mdo): ldi nams dang / myi 'am rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bku ra sti byas/ bla mar byas// ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas/ lha dang/ kU dang / gnod sbyin dang / l+h+wa ma yin dang / nam mkha' ldi pa dang / myi 'am
193b6(mdo): tsa dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod ci shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / bdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zo rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi de
193b7(mdo): 'atun dang bcas mnyan tu yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi che la khyim bdag mgon myed zas sbyin kyi kun dka' ra pa na bzhugs so// de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/ tshon dpon gnyis phan tshun myi mthun par gyur na te/ de gnyis gcig ni rdzogs byed la
193b8(mdo): da gcig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dad do// de nas de gnyis phan tshun rtam tu bya ba nges par byed do// rdzogs byed kyi dge bsnyen na re/ sangs rgyas pas rdzogs byed ches khyad par du 'phags so// zhes zer ro// sangs rgyas kyi dge bsnyen
194a1(mdo): na re/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ches khyad par du 'phags so// zhes zer ro// de nas de gnyis kyis mdog pa thams cad yal bar bya ba'i skugs kyi rta bzhag go// de nas re shig na rgyal po gsal rgyal
194a2(mdo): gyis thos nas/ blon po rnams la de gnyis kyi skyong sa shig ces sgo'o// de nas blon po de dag gis yul thams cad tu dal bsgrags te/ da ste zhag bdun na sangs rgyas dang mu stags can gi dge bsnyen gnyis kyi sbyang bar chad kyis/ su rmad du
194a3(mdo): byang ba lta 'dod pa de dag sheg shig ces byas so// de nas zhag btun lon pa nas phyogs go skabs langs pa zhig tu myi 'bum phrag tu 'dus pa dang / nam ka la lA Ta 'bum phrag tu ma 'dus pa'i nang du ba klad kyi lci bas dkyil 'khor byas te
194a4(mdo): spos dang me tog 'phreng thams cad bsdogs pa la/ thog ma kho nar mu ste kas can gi dge bsnyen gyis bden pas gsol ba gdab pa byas te/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis rdzogs byed la bstsogs pa// ston/ 
194a5(mdo): pa drug mchog yin pa'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des na/ me toH/ 'di dag dang 'dug pa 'di pa/ rgya 'di de dag gi thar tu song shog ces byas so// de skad ces brjod pa'i mdo la me tog de dag ni sa la lhags
194a6(mdo): so// me ni sho lo// rgya ni se la thim zhing yod yongs su zad de/ yongasu tshugs par gyur da to// de nas skye bo phal po che de dag gos camo dang ga zha bton te/ skad po che byung ngo // de nas mu stegs can ko dge snyen de dag gis de mthong nas/ 
194a7(mdo): car kyi zing bar 'dug la ma/ go pa zhing 'jug pa brgyas se// myig pab nas sobs pa med par gyur te/ sems khongs su cad la lag pa la mo mtshugs bcas nas 'khams shing 'dun no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi slob sa
194a8(mdo): dga' ches nas/ dga' zhing mdangs phyung ba'i myig dang ldan pas/ bla gos phrag la gcig tu gzadade/ bus mo rnams pa'i langs la bcugs das/ bden pas gsol bzhad pa pa byas// zadad 'dang den pa'itshog na pags
194b1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyi mchog yin pa'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i cho ga des na me tog 'di dag dang / bdug pa ni dang / rgya 'di bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du so zhig ces byas so// de skad ces brjod pa me do la/ 
194b2(mdo): me tog de dag gi dang pa brgyus pa bzhin du nam mkha' la 'phags nas/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal logs su kham ltas te/ song ngo po// bdug pa ni spri ni gi mgo lta bur gyur to// rtsa ni bye rgya'i sdong bu lta bur gyur to// de nas skye bo'i
194b3(mdo): tshogs phal po che de dag gis cho 'phrul de mthong nas/ tsamo dang ga zha bton te skad po che byer nas/ de dag song ba'i phyi bzhin 'brangs te dong ngo // de nas me tog de dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi steng na 'dug go// bdug pa dang rgyan
194b4(mdo): spyan snga na 'dug go// de nas skye bo phal po che de dag dga' bar gyur da te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ chos nyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la mdo 'di bkra
194b5(mdo): sa lad to// bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'di ni mchog tu gdags pa yin te/ gsum gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa pa/ chos mchog tu 'dags pa dang / dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa'i
194b6(mdo): sangs rgyas mchog tu gdag pa gang zhe na/ bram ze dpa khyim bdag rnams dang / sems can rkapa byed rnams sam/ rkang gnyis sam/ rkang bzhi rnams sam// rkang mangs rnams sam gzugs can rnams sam/ 'du
194b7(mdo): shes can rnams sam/ 'dushes can ma yin pa rnam sems/ 'du shes yod pa yang ma yid/ 'du shes byed pa yangs yin pa gang yang dub ste/ de dag gon na ni da ba'in gshegs pa das bcom pa yang das par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
194b8(mdo): mtshan mo par bstan to// yangs rgyas la mngond pa dgal bar dub 'de dag di/ mchog sa mngon par dag la yin te/ mchog tu mngon pa dga' bdad dam 'de na ni rnam par ston rnarnamapa minang cad kya nga marnas pa
195a1(mdo): gyi rnams kyi nang du myar gyu dad pa rnams kyi mchog 'ba' zhig tu byu dad par shes par bya ste/ bram ze dang khyim bdag na pas 'di ni sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o// chos mchog tu gdags pa gang zhen
195a2(mdo): 'dus byas sam 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams gang yang rung ste/ de dag gi na ni// 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos mchog yin par bstan to// chos la mngon par dga' bar su yang dud pa de dag ni// mchog la mngon par dga' sna
195a3(mdo): dkal ba yin te/ mchog la mngon par dga' bar de dag ni rnam par smin pa yang / lha rnams kyi nangs skar bya rad pa rnams sam/ byin pas kyi nang du myor gyur da pa rnams kyi mchog 'bal zhig tu bya da par shes par
195a4(mdo): bya ste/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'di 'i chos mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o// dge 'dun mchog ta gdags pa gang zhen 'dus pa 'am tshogs sam mang po 'am/ 'khor ga pa ya bdu ba ste/ de dag gi neng nani
195a5(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyen thos kyi dge 'dun mchog yin par snyan to/ dge 'dun la mngon par dga' ba su yang rung ba de dag ni/ mchog la mngon par dag 'khon te/ mchodag la mngon par dgal ba me de da
195a6(mdo): ni rnam par smin pa yang lha rnams kyi nang tu lhar gyur da pa rnams sam/ myi rnams kyi nang du myar gyur da pa rnams kyi mchog 'ba' shig tu 'gyur bar bya ste/ bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams 'di na dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa rje
195a7(mdo): pa zhes bya'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na/ bram ze dang / khyim bdag de dag gi rnaMm kha chog gas ni sangs rgyab dang / chos dang dge 'dun rnams la dad bcad do// khacig gos na skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'odani
195a8(mdo): blangs so// 'acig gos ni rab tu byung dam/ pol myog lnga dang ldan pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di ga so'o bkyi brtan par bya ga ste 'du byed kyinam pa thams cad nyil ba dang / srung ba dang / rnam par 'asong bdas / rnam 'ar 'dzi
195b1(mdo): pa'i chos can du rtsad chod nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad yangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum tu byas so// mu stegs can go dge bsnyen des kyang bcom ldan 'das la dad pa rnyed de// de nas sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin tu zhag
195b2(mdo): la phyag 'tshal te/ smon lam btab pa dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yong su rtog pa 'dis bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dran pa myed cing yongs su 'dren par sems can ma rgal ba rnams sgrol ba dang / ma grol ba rnam
195b3(mdo): 'grel pa dang / dbugs mya phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs rgyas su gyur da cig ces byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi se mu stegs can gau dge snyan
195b4(mdo): dede'i rgyu gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa dang / las gcig nas gcig tu ba rgyud pa mkhyen nas/ 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom// ldan 'das rnams kang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad de'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe
195b5(mdo): zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams byung nas/ kha cog ni 'og tu 'gro'o// kha cig ni steng tu 'gro'o// 'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal la ba yang sos dang
195b6(mdo): zhen ka dpa/ bskus 'jom dang / po 'bod dang / ngo 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu cha pa/ mnar byed pa dang / rgya'ur can dang / chu'ur rdol dang / so thams tsa thams dang / kyi hud zer dang / a chu zer dang / ud pal ltar
195b7(mdo): gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa dang / pad gas pa chen por so banas/ mtha'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsal bar gyur da te bab bo// grang ba'i sems cam dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur da te'
195b8(mdo): po// de la na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse gzhil bar gyur da to// de nas de dag 'di snyam tu sems te/ kye mi bdag cag 'din sa ni 'phos sam/ 'om te gzhan tu skyes sam/ snyam mo// de nas de dag dad pa bskyed
196a1(mdo): pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad do// de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang ni 'phos par ma gyur da la/ gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi 'on
196a2(mdo): kyang / sngon ma byung ba la sems can snang ba 'da' mthus// bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams kyi zhol bar gyur da to snyam mo// de nas de dag sprul pa la mngon par dga' bar gyurd nas/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i
196a3(mdo): las de zad de/ lha dang mya rnams kyi nang tu gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nyid 'tshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro// steng tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ro sa rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang
196a4(mdo): 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzha na 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa 'du nan 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od rgyang nas
196a5(mdo): dang / tshad myed 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnam sa dang / tshad myed dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / srin myed na mas dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / 
196a6(mdo): myo che ba rnams dang / myi gtung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og myin gi lha rnams kyi bar tu song nas/ myi rtag pa dang / myi sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag myed pa'i sgra sgrogs so// 
196a7(mdo): tshogs su bcad pa gnyis kyang brjod par byed de// nyes par 'byung ba rtsam par gyis// sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis// 'dam bu'i khyim na klar chen bzhin// 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis// gang zhig chos 'dul 'di
196a8(mdo): nyid la// bag yod spyod par byed pa ni// skye ba'i 'khor pa rab sasangs nas// sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur// zhes brjod par byed do// de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams bskor nas// 
196b1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin 'brangs te/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lu pa bston par bzhed na ni// bcom ldan 'das kyi snga ma lugs su myi snang bar 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs par lung ston par bzhed na ni// mdun lo/ 
196b2(mdo): su kyi snang bar 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi 'thil tu myi snang bar 'gyur ro// tud 'gror 'askye bar lung bston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi rting par myi snang bar 'gyur ro// zhabs kyi rting
196b3(mdo): par myi snang bar 'gyur ro// yi dgas su skye bar lung bston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi 'a' khor gyi snang bar 'gyur ro// myir skye bar lung bston par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su myi snang bar 'gyur ro// stobs kyi 'khor lo sbyar ba'i rgyal
196b4(mdo): por lung bston par bzhed na ni// phyag g.yon pa'i 'thil tu myi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal poR+Ya lung bston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i 'thil du myo snang bar 'gyur ro// lhar skye bar lung ston pa
196b5(mdo): bzhed na ni/ lte bar myi snang bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi byang chub tu skye ba ma lung bston par bzhed na ni/ zhal tu myi snang bar 'gyur ro// rangs ngas rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni// sbyin 'tshams kyi mdzod
196b6(mdo): spur myi snang bar 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lu bston par bzhed na ni/ dbu'i tsug tor tu myi snang bar 'gyur ro// nganas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan
196b7(mdo): 'das kyi dbu'i tsug tor tu myi snang bar gyur da to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dka' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa tshon cad sna cheg stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can// mang po zhal gi sgo nas 'byung bar gyur da// de'i sa
196b8(mdo): phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis// nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin// yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang myi dges spang ba'i// sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i ngag gi dem sgyur gyur da pa// rgyal ba dgra thub
197a1(mdo): rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par// pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog ste bu'i 'dzum myi ston// brtan po nyid kyi blo 'is dus bab mkhyen lags na// / dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba dzas// rngub
197a2(mdo): ba khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang // bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes pa gsal bar gsol pa// rgya mtsho la dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtad pa'i// 'gon po rdzagos sangs rgyas rjes kyisang 'dzum myi bton// gang gi don
197a3(mdo): du dpa' bo 'dzum pa son badzad pa// de'i phyogs las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' rtsa lad pa/ kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin te/ de ni de bzhin no// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs
197a4(mdo): ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu rkyen mye dad par 'dzum pa myi mdzad do// kun dga' bo mu stegs can gi/ dge bsnyen 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong de/ btsun
197a5(mdo): pa mthong lags so// kun dga' bo mu stegs can gi dge bsnyen 'di/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sos bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yod sa su rtong pa 'dis/ bskal ba gangs myed pa gsum gyis yang ngas par
197a6(mdo): sgrub par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/ snying rje chen po sa yongs su bsgos pa'i pha sang tu byedad pa drug yangs su bskam pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa drug yongasu rdzogs par byas nas/ stobs bcur dang / bye 'jigs
197a7(mdo): po bzhi la dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsu dang / snying rje rje po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi g.yol ba zhes bya bar gyur te/ 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de'i spyod pa'i chos
197a8(mdo): ni gang la la mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis phyaka la rtsa lad pa nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 
197b1(mdo): rgyal po zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnaMs dang / blon po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi myo nas dang / tshong dpor nas dang / deng dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / glu nas dang
197b2(mdo): gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / myo 'omo tsau rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis/ bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ r-i mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / glu dang / gnod
197b3(mdo): sAni dang/ lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lnga pi dang / myi 'amo tsa dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims chad
197b4(mdo): bdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge la 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan tu yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyitshal 'gon myed zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe kos
197b5(mdo): lu'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / rgyal pos skyes dag gnyis pan tshun gyi mdu par gyur to// den sum skyes dbras dpung gi tshogs yan la bzhi pa/ grang mtsho tshogs dang / rtamatshogs dang / ga te chag pa dang / 
197b6(mdo): dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir drangs so// ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis kyang / rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang po che'i
197b7(mdo): tshogs dang rta'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas bdag dang g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir drangs so zhes thos so// thos nas des kyang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi
197b8(mdo): gla po che'i tshogs dang / til choms dang / shi 'i tshobs dang / dpung 'u 'gi tshobs so bsgon nas/ rgyal po ma skyes rab dang / g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyim drangs so// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras// gos pa'i
198a1(mdo): rgyal po bsal rgyal gyi glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta tshobs dang / shi na 'i tshogs dang / dpul lu chung gi rdzobs thams cad phrogs te/ ko ma 'i rgyal po gsal rgyal// pal zhing skrag la gdugs te/ rab su pham/ 
198a2(mdo): zhing rgyab kyis phyogs par gyur da nas/ shing rta gcig pus mnyan du yod par song ste/ lan gsum gi bar tu yang de ltar gyur da to// de na sa ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal mya ngan gi khang par zhugs nas/ lag pa la mom tshugs byas te/ sems khos
198a3(mdo): su rgyad cing 'dug ko// de nas mnyan tu yod pan+da ya/ tshob dpon phyug ci de nor ma la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu la nor dpa'agran pa zhig 'dug pa des/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal
198a4(mdo): rgyal ji ltar pham zhing skaka la rdugs te/ rab tu pham zhing rgyab kyis phyogs par gyu rad nas/ shi bi rta gcig pus mnyan du yod par song ngo // zhes thos so// thos nas kyang ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal gla la ba der song ste phyin nas/ rgyal po gsal
198a5(mdo): rgyal la rgyal bar gyur da cig/ sku tshe re nge par shog shig ces bstod nas smras pa lha tsal la slad tu thugs ngan mdzad/ lha bdag gis ji tsam gyis lA da tung yang lha 'di ltar dgyes mgur mdzad par 'gyur ba de tsam kau ga ser lha la 'bul bar 'tshal lo/ 
198a6(mdo): zhes byas so// des de la gser phung po chen po srungs te/ der myi 'dug pas kyang myi 'greng bar myi mnong la/ 'greb pas kyang kyi 'dug pa myo mthong ba zhig phul lo// de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gis bdag nyid kyi yul du rtog chen go myo kun tu bkye ste/ mya ngag c-i/ 
198a7(mdo): zer ba nyon coka ces byas so// re zhig na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi chel na/ rgan po gnyis shog phan tshun rtam zer te/ pad ma'i thi ba zhes bya ba'i yul gyi reg thabs yod de// de la mr-i star a gang yin pa de dag ni g.yul gi gtung zan du gtong / 'brang ga pa yin pa de dag ni hA
198a8(mdo): tu gzhog/ myo mchog tu dpa' ba gang yin pa de dag ni brgyab tu gzhog go zhes zer ro// de nas de dag gis rgyal po la bsnyad de/ ko sa la'i rgyal po kasal rgyal gyis thos nas/ de bzhin du dpung gi tshogs yan lag da bzhi'o gi bskon nas/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang
198b1(mdo): g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir drangs so// de nas rgyal po ga la la rgyal gyis lus 'phags mo'i 'u rgyal po ma skyes dgral glang po'i tshogs thams cad phrogs// rta'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chu ba'i tshogs kyang phrogs so// lus 'phags ma'i bu rgyal/ 
198b2(mdo): po ma skyes dgra yang pham zhing skrag la gtugs te/ rab tu pham zhong rgyab kyis bltas par gyur da nas/ gson por bzung ste shing rtal cig la bskyon nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ 
198b3(mdo): phyogs cig tu 'dug go// phyogs cig tu 'dug nasu ka bcom ldan 'das la ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa rgyal po ma skyes dgra nI yun ri ba po nas bdag gi 'khon bzla ma lags par 'khon du 'dzin pa dang / 
198b4(mdo): dgra zla ma lags par dgra bgyid pa lags mod kyi 'odi ni bdag gi grogs po'i bu lags pa'i slad du bdag ni 'di 'gum par myi 'tshal te/ 'di btang ba dar 'tshal lo zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rgyal po chen po thong
198b5(mdo): shig ces bka'u stsa la da nas// rgyal bar gyu rad na 'khon pa ma pad+mam par gyurd na sdug bsngal gnas// rgyal dang pham pa spangs na ni// nye bar zhi sti ba de bar gnas// de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di snyam du sems te rga
198b6(mdo): bdag gis rgyal srid phyir thob pa 'di na/ tshong nga dpor 'di dran yin gyis/ bdag gis 'di la ni 'dod pa'i bya dka'i sbyin pa'i skabs phye'o snyam mo// de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis tshong dpon de la mi 'dod pa'i bye dga' skabs phye na/ 
198b7(mdo): de na re bdag ci dka'i byen 'tshal gyis/ bdag zhag bdun ga ber du ci dga' mgur bgyid pa'i rgyal srod rtsol tsog ces byas so// de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gis bdag gi yul thams cad du dril bsgrags te/ nga'i rgyal sride zhag bdun kyi bar du
198b8(mdo): dpon la byin no zhes bsgo'o// re shigan dpon des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang / kyil po gsal rgyal 'khor dang bcas pa zhag bdun gyi bar du gtugs chod la gyan drangs so// yul ka zhi deng ko sa la'i na skye bo'i tshogs
199a1(mdo): ji snyed 'khod pa de dag la yang pho nya btang ste/ zhag bdun go bar tu khyed khral thud byed par ci dka' mgur 'khod cig/ bde ba la reg gnas par gyis zhig/ 'dir yang sheg la sangs rgyas dang chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su sopa/ 
199a2(mdo): shika/ ra'i ston mo yang 'tshal la/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur gyis shig ces byas nas/ des zhag bdun gyi bar bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la/ bkur sti chen pos bkur sti byas so// myo 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang dge
199a3(mdo): ba la btsud do// zhag btun lon nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ sems la rtas par byas nas/ smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtse ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su btong ba 'dis bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren
199a4(mdo): pa myed cing yongs su 'dren pa myed par sems can ma rgal ba rnams sgrol ba dang / ma grol ba rnams 'grel pa dang / dbugs myi phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa da / pa/ yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan 'das pa rnaMs yangs mya
199a5(mdo): nga las rno ba mangs rgyam sa kya kyi chos rgyab so// ded pa bcos pas ramaco ba cad da rgya gtsuganapagacig tu byud pa dang / sam shes dade/ tu btungad pam byed dpa 'dus pa mang ngo // 'don pangs rgya bcos sa
199a6(mdo): nams gang gi che 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe zhal nas 'o zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang dkar po nam byang nas/ kha cog ni 'og tu 'gro'o// kha cis no snying du 'gro'o// 'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang mos dang / 
199a7(mdo): thig naka dab bskul 'joms dang / dra 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / chab dang / rab tu ma pa dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / mabur rol dang / mo zhes rnams dang / kyo hud zer dang / ma rgya zer dang / ung pal skarags pa dang / pad la ltar gas pa / 
199a8(mdo): pad ma ltarags pa chen por so nas/ ma ba'i sems can dmyal bkang yin pa de dag tu na bsal bar gyu rang te 'bab po// sems can dmyal bkang yin pa de dag na dro por gyur da te 'bab po// des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rtse gzhil bar gyur da to// 
199b1(mdo): de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye mi bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'on te gzhan du skyes so snyam mo// de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das stsal pa 'gyed par mdzad de/ de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam tu sems teg kye tsa
199b2(mdo): bdag cag 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyurd la/ gzhan tu yang ma skyes mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems snang ba 'di'i mthus/ bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse gzhil bar gyur da to snyam mo// de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga'
199b3(mdo): bar gyur da nas// sems can dpral bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/ lha dang gyi rnams kyi nang du kang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du 'gyur ba deng / nying 'tshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro// steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag mi rgyal chen pa'i lo ros rnams dang / suM bcu rtsa gsum pa rnaMs dang
199b4(mdo): 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dka' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul/ da dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i matun na 'don pa rnams dung / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 
199b5(mdo): 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad byed dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnam sa dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / sprin myed rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / myi che rnams dang / myi gtu rnams dang / gya nom sngang rnams dang / shin tu mthong
199b6(mdo): narnams dang / 'og myin ka lha rnams kyi bar du song nas myi rtag pa dang / stong pa dang bdag myed pa'i sgra sgrogs so// tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang brjod par byed de/ nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis// sangs rgyas stan la sbyor bar gyis// 'dam bu'i khyim la kla chen bzhin// 
199b7(mdo): 'chi bdag sde na gzhom par gyis// gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la// bag yod myod par byed pa ni// skye ba la 'khor ba rab spangs nas// sug sAl zad par byed par 'gyur zhes brjod par byed do// de nas 'o zer de dag gis stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khaMs
199b8(mdo): bskor nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brangs te/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snga ma lugs su mya snang bar 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun log su myi snang bar 'gyur ro// 
200a1(mdo): sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi 'thil tu myi snang bar 'gyur ro// dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi rti bar myi snang bar 'gyur ro// ya dgas su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi 'the
200a2(mdo): bor gyi snang bar 'gyur ro// phyir smra bar lung ston par ba'ang na ni sus mo gnyis su kyi snang bar 'gyur ro// stobs kyi 'khor lo snar ba'i rgyal por skye bar lung skon par 'azhed na ni/ b+hag g.yom pa'i 'thil du myi snang 'ang 'gyur ro// 'jo phyo bas smyung du
200a3(mdo): rgyal pos sor bar 'asheng ram phrag g.yas pa'i 'phel du byi snyam par 'byung ngo // ltang suM pa bzhe sa ni lte bar myi snang bar phung ngo // nyan thos kyi byung chub tu lung sum par gled nani / zhal du mye snang bar 'byung ngo ro// yang sangs rgyas kyi bya brgya
200a4(mdo): lu'abros par bzhed ra srung 'jams kyi mdzod snang gyi spang ba gyur lo da/ thar byed pa yang ngas par dgas pa'i byang chub tu yang snang par bded na ni/ dang/ su gdong dus snganga'ang 'gyur ro// dengs sde zeng de das dam 'ar
200a5(mdo): ldan 'das la ya gsupa spong ba byas te/ bcom ldang las kyis 'ang/ rgyag nong po ma lar gyur to// denam po dang sadra ba kur dathal bos pa mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa// chos lnga stong gis sde
200a6(mdo): ba sna tshogs can// mang po zhal gi sgo nas byung bar gyur // de'i sa phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis// nyis shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin// yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// rgong dang bral zhing myi dge spangs kyi
200a7(mdo): sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi das pa'i rgyur gyur da pa// rgyal bangs yul rnams ni rgya rkyen ma mchis par// pad ma'i rtsa dang dang mdog la bu'i 'dum gyi sgodang // btan po nyid kyi blo'is dus pab mkhyen lags na
200a8(mdo): dge' sbyong rgyal dpeng nyan pa som nyi 'chal pa rnams// thub pa khyu mchog kau ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang // bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol// rgya mtsho dang ni r-i rgyal lta bur brtan pa'o// 
200b1(mdo): 'gon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnaMs kyi na da 'dzu ma myaM ston da/ gang gi don du dpa'o 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/ de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ kun dka'o de ni de bzhin no// de ni de
200b2(mdo): bzhin te/ kun dka' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu myed rkyen myed par 'dzum pa myi mdzad do// kun dga' bo tshong dpon 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge'
200b3(mdo): 'dun dang bcas pa la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa dang / skye bo phal po che dge dwa la btsud pa mthong de/ btsun pa mthong la ka so// kun dga' bo tshong dpon 'odi'i dgel ba'i cha pa dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya bo'i chos yong su rtod pa
200b4(mdo): 'odas bskal pa grangs myed pa gsu gyis yang dag par bsgrub par byas po'i byang chub yang dag par bslabs te/ snying rje chen pos yongasu bskos po'i pa da rol tu phyind pa drug yongasu rdzogs par byas te/ stobs shurgya dang / 
200b5(mdo): kyi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsu dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgya'ajigs sbyin zhes bya bar gyur te 'jig rten du 'byung ra 'gyur
200b6(mdo): de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni kang pa la seMs mngon par dka' bar gyur da pa 'odi yin no// bco ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bkalasaHlad nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bco ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon pa
200b7(mdo): bstod do// / gang po la tshogs pa'i rtogs pa brgya pa las/ sau kyi tshig su bcad rtsa dang po rdzogs s+ho// // sngo ni mnyan pa dang ne ka Sha zhus/ yas kyi nad dang mo 'phrul dang / lo snga pa dang stobs mchog sbyin
200b8(mdo): shi ka dang lha'i zhes// mnyan pa zhen ni sangs rgyas bcoM ldan 'das la rgyal po rnaMs dang / blon po chen po nas dang / phyug po nas dang / po zab 'tshar kyi myo nas dang / tshong dben nas dang / ded dpo nas dang / lha nas dang / 
201a1(mdo): klu nas dang / gnod sbyin nas dang / lha ma yin rnaMs dang / na ma'al ldeng rnaMs dang / mye le ci rnaMs dang / lto 'phye chen po rnaMs kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byos/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / glu dang / gnod sbyin da
201a2(mdo): lha ma yin dang / ni mkha' lding dang / mye 'oci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnaMs kyis mchod cing shes te'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nas chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / bdan dang / snyun gsos dang
201a3(mdo): smad zo ba nas brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge la 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/ chu klungapa 'ang ldan gyi 'jug mnyan pa'i grong na bzhug so// de nas mnyan pa de dag bco ldan 'das ka la ba der song ste/ lhags nas bcoM ldan 'das kyi
201a4(mdo): zhabs la 'gol bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas mnyan pa de dag la bco ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rta gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzi nad tu bcug/ yang dag par gzer bstod
201a5(mdo): yang dag par dkal bar mdzad do// chos kyi ni grangs rnams yang dag par bstan da/ yang dag par 'dzind tu bcug/ yang dag pa gzer bstod/ yang dag par dka' bar mdzad nas cad myi gsum
201a6(mdo): bar bzhugs// de nas mnyan pa de dag stan las langs te 'a bra sa zag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas po'i lha ra sa la btsugs te/ bco ldan 'das ka la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba bdud na
201a7(mdo): bco ldan 'das la gsolang ba/ bcom ldan 'das dge' slong ka dgel 'dun dang thabs gcig tu pa chu rlung khang ldan gyi 'gro tu bdag cag gi der sang gtugs chod gsol bar tsi ka nang / gru ze las kyang bsgral
201a8(mdo): lo zhes gsol nas/ ba mo ldan 'das kyis kyang mnyan pa rnas la nang myi gsung bas gnang ngo // de dag mnyan pa de dag gis chu grung khang ldan gyi 'gro rdo dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo myed par byas te/ rgyal mtshan dang
201a9(mdo): ba dan naM bsgreng/ me tog sna tshogs ni gtor/ spos kyi snod dag gau nang nas ni bud+hag pa gsol/ zhal zas bzang po ni pa shes/ me tog dmar po na sta gon byas so// gru thaM gyi steng yang me tog gi khang pa dag
201b1(mdo): dag kas brgyan nas/ bcoM ldan 'das la 'phrin gyis gtugs chod bskul nas/ btsun pa gcugs chod la bab ste/ bshos lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis da de l+r-ing+yas la bab par dgongs te/ gshegs su gsol/ 
201b2(mdo): zhes bskul to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge' 'dun gyis zham phreng byas te/ dge' slong gau dge la 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/ mnyan pa'i grong ga la ba der gshegs te/ byon nas/ dge'
201b3(mdo): slong gi dge 'dun gyi kung la gang du bshams pa la bzhugs so// de nas marnyan pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas las tshogs pa dge' slong gi dge' 'dun nas bde bar bzhugs par reg nas/ rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang / bcwa pa
201b4(mdo): war ma mang pos tshim par byas te/ ci bzhed pa bstabs so// rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang ban pa rtsang ma mang po rnam grangs du mas tshim par byas te/ ci bzhed pa bstabs nas bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol yin te
201b5(mdo): gsang sder ni kyu phyag ni bcabs par rig nas/ stan ches dma' bdag khyer de chos mnyan pa'i phyir bco ldan 'das bshes gsal ta kyi spyan sngar 'khod do// de nas bco ldan 'das kyis mnyan pa de dag gi bka la nyal ba da
201b6(mdo): khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bsta dang te/ de zos pas mnyan pa rna mas ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo// kho chog ni lan cig phyir 'ong
201b7(mdo): ba'i 'bras bu tho'o// 'o cig ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo// kha cig ni nyon mongs pa thos cad spangs nas/ dgra bco pa nyid mngon gsu tu byaso// kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do// 
201b8(mdo): kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do// kha cig gis ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// 'khor de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang / 
201b9(mdo): chos la 'bab pa dang / dge' 'dun la bab pa la bkod de/ de nas mnyan pa de dag gis bco ldan 'das dge' slong gi dge la 'dun dang thabs gcig tu bkur sti chen po dang ldan pas gru ze las bsgral to// 
202a1(mdo): dge slong dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthong ba mthong sna sems dab bang 'byung te/ sangs rgyab bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge ba'i rtsa la long dag gang du rngang langs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa yang
