323a4(mdo): ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bkalas la pa/ dge slong dag 'di ste ste/ nga'i dge slong phyis khung 'di no// ngal nyan thos kyi dge slong ngan ngon la mos pa rnams kyi mchog yin no// 
323a5(mdo): de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad ga rtsadab/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsu na ba gnas brtan phyis khung gas/ las mi bgyis na des 'di
323a6(mdo): lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur da lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalas na lad pa// dge slong dag gyis khung nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ 
323a7(mdo): dpal bzhin du byung sa// gdon gyi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ phyi sa khung nyid kyis las byas shing ba sregs pa de dag gzhan su zhig gos nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ 
323a8(mdo): dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol kyi sa la khams la rnam par smin par mya 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par myi 'gyur te/ las dge
323b1(mdo): ba dang/ myi dge ba byas shi de bsags pa rnams ni non pa'i phung po dpag khams dang snamached rnams 'be' shig la sbyin par 'gyur ngo ro// lus can dag gi seMs rnams mi/ bskal pa brgyar yang chud kyi
323b2(mdo): tshogs shong dus la ba' ba na/ 'bras bu nyid du sbyi nang par gyur // dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'odi nyod le/ skye dku'atshe lo bzhi khro thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs
323b3(mdo): bdag ba com ze yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyend pa/ skyes bu 'dus pa'i khas sbyor la/ blan myed pa/ lha dang mya rnams kyi ston pa
323b4(mdo): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'jog ces bya ba 'jig rte na du byang ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang mdzes ldan zhes bya ba na/ rten cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe rgyal po'i pho brang der khyim bdag
323b5(mdo): ka se gtsug lag khang zhag patshaMgs te/ der phyogs dang yul sA tshogs na gnas pa'i dge slong dag 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / ke nas par sems so// gtsug lag khang de na/ so so skye bo'o dge slong
323b6(mdo): zhig gnas te/ de yang gnas la ga ni tu ser sna che bzhog ste/ dge slong gas rudu 'ong ba rnams mthong na/ tshig pa zla zhing 'khrug la gnod sems byed de/ zhul khrul por 'dug cid 'jug bskyed par byed na
323b7(mdo): dge slong gang dag gtsug lag kha de nas kung du 'gro ba de dag mthong nan// sa cher dka' zhing mchog tu dga' la/ skyel zhing smra bar byed do// phyise re zhig na gzhig ga yus nas dge slong dgra bcom bzhi
323b8(mdo): 'ongs so// gtsug lag khang gi bdag pi de yang phyir myi 'ong ba yin to// des spyod lam gi sgo b+haras dgra btsam pa yin par shes so// de de nas dga' ba skyes te/ phyid nyin dge slong gi dge 'dun ma
324a1(mdo): pa tshag dang / ldan pa'i sa dang / thugasas kyas drangs so// dge slong gan pa de den myed pa mas / lagags cad nyid rdzog dang ldan pa'i rjes kyang dus/ banas kyang brnams pa dang / 
324a2(mdo): dge slong gzhi pa rdo yang 'dzes te/ de yang chog dang ldan pa'i khrus sar song nas/ gtsug lag khang go bdag po khyed rengs su byung ste/ dge slong gsar du 'ongs pa'i blo dor byed cinga'i 'dug pa mthong ngo // 
324a3(mdo): nas de pran dag zhes nam ga des sdang ba'i sems kyis dgag mos grub pa smos te/ dge slong khyed na lus myig tsang bas byugs kyang drwa'o/ snyir bdag 'di lce bu la ba snyed bkum sa nad pa na de snyam la
324a4(mdo): no zhes byas so// de nas dgra bcom pa des nyon mongs 'di las ches myi bzang pa'i skyes pa can tu 'gyur na gyi rlung / sgyum nas/ cang kyi zer ba dang da blangs so// me shi ga na dang bya blangs
324a5(mdo): par gyur te/ dros khag par dge slong gzhi pa des/ kra bcom pas khyod kyis spang ba'i sems bskyed do// zhes tho pa zos so// thos nas kyang de 'gyod pa skyes so// de nas
324a6(mdo): dge slong dgra bcom pa de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/ 'phags pa khyod la bdag gis khyid la tshig rtsub bo smras pa de bzod par gsol lo// zhes byas so// de nas dgra bcom pa des/ de'i dad pa bskyed pa'i
324a7(mdo): phyir de/ nams zhal la 'phags nas/ cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan to// de nas de lhag pam yang 'gyod pa skyes te/ des de'i ma thun du mas kyi nyes pa de mthos zhing bzhugs te/ shad kyis spangs so// 
324a8(mdo): 'on kyang des mthar thug pa'i ye shes bskyed na me nus so// de nas re shog ma/ 'chi ba'i dus sa khab pa dang / des smon lam btab pa dang / bdag gis dgra bcom pa la sdang ba'i sems basbed pa dang / ngag gi la
324b1(mdo): chub po smras pa/ gang yin pa la las de'i rnam par smind pa ni ba dag gos myong bar ma gyur gcig/ bdag gis klags pa dang / kha don byas pa dang / smyon pa dang / sbyin pa chen po dag byin pa dang / dge 'dun la bsta
324b2(mdo): bkur byas pa'i las kyi rnam par sbyin pa gang yin pa des ni/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyes par byed par shog shig/ ces byas so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ dge
324b3(mdo): slong gzhi bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni/ phyi sa khung 'di nyid yin te/ des dgra bcom pa la ngag gi las rtsub mo smras pa'i las kyi rnam par sbyind pa des na/ 'khor ba na sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa myong bar gyu rad te
324b4(mdo): las de nyid kyi lkog ma lus pas/ da ltar srid pa tha ma la khab/ pa'i tshe yang / 'di ltar dri zhi po mchog tu dring bar gyur pa myi gtsang ba dang / stag snyig la dga' bar gyur da to// des kha don byas pa
324b5(mdo): dang / phung po sa mkhas pa dang / khams la mkhas pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa dang / rten cing 'bres par 'byung bas mkhas pa dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pas mkhas par byas pa de ni/ ngani
324b6(mdo): mtha pa sa mar babyu nas/ nyon mangs pa sems cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon gsum du byas so// dge slong dag de bas na 'di stir bslal bar bya ste/ ser sna sna ba la brtson par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhed/ phyis thung mas/ 
324b7(mdo): skye zor gyu da pa' nyes pa gang yin pa de dag 'byung bar myi 'gyur ba dang / des dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa'i yon ta ga tshogs 'di lta bur 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslal par bya'o// bcom ldan 'ad
324b8(mdo): kyis de skad ces bka' saHlang ras nas/ dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mya 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po las gtogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rengs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
325a1(mdo): gsungs pas mngon par bstod do// / rtogs pa brjod pa brgya 'ams sdig gi tshogs su bcad pa lnga rdzogs s+ho// / sdom ni/ sus nas dang ni zla la dang / 
325a2(mdo): sa ma dang ni depas ldan ma/ gos dang ni tso bo nya dang / ma he dang ni gas sbyong dang / ngang pa thamar brjod pa yin/ sbrus nag po zhes bya ba ni// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen
325a3(mdo): po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor go myo dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod spyan da / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkhal lding
325a4(mdo): rnams dang / mya'am rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis/ debakur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / skam yin dang / dang/ 
325a5(mdo): mkha' lding dang / myi'am mi dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis ma chod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ bsod nam sa chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims
325a6(mdo): cha dang / gdan dang / skyon gsos dang / sman sa pa rnams brnyes pa// nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ rgyal po'i kha ba na 'od ma'i ches bya ka/ san da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe rgyal po'i
325a7(mdo): kyi grong khyer na/ khyim bdag phyug cing nar mang la yongs khyod che ba// yongs su 'dzind pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rngam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa// nam thos kyi bu'i nor pa dang 'gram pa zhig yod de// de yang ser
325a8(mdo): sna can 'jungs pa/ yo byad rnams kun tu 'dzind pa/ khas yang gtor ma yang myi ster ba zhig ste/ des dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / sdug cing phongs pa dang / bkren pa dag mthong na// sems spa bar
325b1(mdo): byed do// de nas des ra ga bskyed mos tshal phyag ser dngul ga phung po chen po sbas te/ bzhag nas/ de de la chags te/ lhag par zhen bzhin du shi'o// de shi nas de nyid kyi steng du sbrul gdug pa/ sprul na/ 
325b2(mdo): bo chen po myag gdug pa zhag tu skyes so// de nas skyed mo tshal der/ skye bo'i tshogs gab song ba de dag bltas pa tsam gas gsod par byed do// rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer thog khrag tu yang che ge mo'o bskyed
325b3(mdo): seMs lam du sang po de dag thams cad/ brlag par 'gyur ro zhes sgra grag par gyur da to// skye ba'i tshogs kyis kyang rgyal po gzugs can gang po la gso yang to// de nas rgyal po gzugs cam
325b4(mdo): po 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma no// gas par/ de 'dul nus pa su zhig yod snyam mo// de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po skye bo mang po'i 'khor dang bcas pa
325b5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das gas pa der song ste/ phyi nid nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'gro bas phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can skye
325b6(mdo): po la chos kyi gtam gas yang bdag par bstan pa/ yang dag par 'dzin tu ban+d+hag/ yang dag par gzengs pasod/ yang dag par dka' bar mdzad do// chos kyi gtam rnam grangs dums yang dag
325b7(mdo): bar bstan dang/ yang dag par 'dzind tu bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas// cang myi gsung bar bzhugs so// de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po snyan
325b8(mdo): las langs te/ pra gos phrag pa gcig tug zar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha bas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs zhal mo sbar bas/ btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
327a1(mdo): sha gces gsolang to// bcom ldan 'das rgyas pa'i lab 'din bskyed mas tshas ga gi sa zhig na/ smragadug pa/ yul dag pa chen pa kyig gdus pazhig mchis te// skye bos pa po bcwag par mthad
327a2(mdo): lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs pa che ba'i slad dud gdus par gsal// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la cang myi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas rgyal po gzugs can
327a3(mdo): snying po/ bcom ldan 'das kyis cang myi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'go bos phyag 'tshal te/ stan las yangs nas song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das de
327a4(mdo): nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas/ snga dro sham thabs dang / chos go/ sa gsol te/ lhung bzed bsdams nas/ skyed mos chos gas pa der gshegs te byon nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
327a5(mdo): 'od zer gser go kha dog can/ nyi ma stong go 'od pas lha// ba dag bkye ste/ de dag gis bskyed mos tshas de dag thams cad snang bar byas so// bskal pa stong tu yongs su
327a6(mdo): zasgoms pa'i byams pa'i 'od zer dag kyang bkye ste/ de dag gis de'i lus la phogam thag tu rab tu sem par gyur to// de nas sbrus gdug pa des phan tshun tu bltas te/ su'i mthus bdas
327a7(mdo): gi lus sim par gyur da cig go snyam pa dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum brtsa ma gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes
327a8(mdo): zar byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgya nad pa// nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mngal ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das
327b1(mdo): sa dad pa'i sems bskyed de/ dad pa'i sems dang ldan par gyu rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan to// bzhon pa 'das khyod nyid kyis rdzas 'di bsgrubs pa
327b2(mdo): des na/ khyod sprul gdug par ltung bar byas so// de yang pal dang pal sems skyed ma/ gter 'di la yang sems ma chags par byas dang legs so// 'di ras shi'i bos nas kyang sems cad
327b3(mdo): bar skye re// de nas gang gi tshwa bcom ldan 'das kyis de tshe rabs dran par mdzad pa de'i tshe de dus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka las \u0f7fla pa// khyod ni dud 'gror skyes pa la// dam nga yis na
327b4(mdo): byar myed// myi khom par ni skyes zin gis// don myed dus pa mis phan 'dir ni rgyal ba snying rjecan// pal dad pa'i sems skyed la// dUd dkro'o skye gnas spangs na legs// 'on tang mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur
327b5(mdo): de nas ye shig na// bcom ldan 'das kyis// sbrul de lhung bzed kyi nang du bcug ste/ 'od ma latshal du bsdams so// de'i skra bas su rgyas po dang / yul ma ga ta'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis sprul
327b6(mdo): gdug pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar btus pa thos so// de nas spus gdug pa des rang gi lus la smad de/ kha 'chos nas/ bcom ldan 'das sems dgal bar gyurd te/ shi nas sum bcu rtsa gsu
327b7(mdo): ba'o lha yul bzang por skyes so// lha'i bu 'am/ lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa rnams ni/ chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos// gang du skyes/ las gang
327b8(mdo): gas skyes snyam mo// de nas sprul gdug pa sas shi 'bos pa dang / sum brgya ma gsum pa'i sa yul pa'ang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dka' bar gyu shA des mthong po// sa
328a1(mdo): sngon sbrul gdug par gyur da pa'i lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag yon nas/ bzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag go cha ma yinags/ 'dag zhag ma son par
328a2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo// de nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur da pa'i lce'i bye// rna ma rngub dkor dag ci 'gul pa thogs pa// sus do gas dang se mo dos brgya nad pa// nor byas
328a3(mdo): tshogs kyis spras pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur gum dang / ta ma la'o lo ma dang / sprig ka las satshogs pa byugs pa des de nyid kyis mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / 
328a4(mdo): pad ma dkar po dang / man da ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan dka gnas pa thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gos katom te/ 
328a5(mdo): chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'du ga go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ sngon sprul gdu/ bar gyur pa'i lha'i bu bsam pa dang / bag la nyas dang khams
328a6(mdo): dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas// 'phags pa'i bden pa gzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bsta nad te/ de thos nas sngon spus gdug par gyur da pa'i lce'i bus/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i tshe
328a7(mdo): li rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rje bcom nas/ rgyu na tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas// dka'i tshig tu brjod pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bdag gi khrag dang
328a8(mdo): mchisa'i skyes tshe bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bzlas pa dang / ngam song go sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang tha rad pa'i sgornams bye ba dang / bdag lha dang gyi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di sa thun
328b1(mdo): bdag la phas kyang ma bkyise mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyas pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis// nad kyi dang gnyer gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis// sngon gyi me rgyan rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ 
328b2(mdo): dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma pa kyis lags so// yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song las/ shin tu myi ba 'ang khyod kyi mthu yis pa cad/ bsod nams rab ldan mtho so 'gro ma
328b3(mdo): b+h+yo// mya ngan 'das pa 'i lam yang bdag gis thob/ bdag gis de rong nyes pa spangs pa'i phyo ke/ shin tu nam dag khyod la brten nas thob/ bdag na sdug bsngal/ rgya mtsho pha rol rgal/ 'phags pa dgos pa
328b4(mdo): li zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/ myi mchog dbang po mya dang lus pa chod pa/ skye dang rka dang 'chi ba'i rad spangs pa/ srid pa stong tu mthong bar dga' ba'i// thub pa khyod ni dang mtho pa 'bras bu lod
328b5(mdo): de nas do shes 'phyang ba dag 'gyur da te/ btud cing zhabs ga/ nyasel na phyag/ 'tshal nas// dgra thubs ni bskor ba byas na sa/ kyang / lha'i 'jig rten kha ltas sgra yul song / de nas sngon sprul
328b6(mdo): gdug par gyur da pa'i bu de/ tshong pa khye srogs phyind pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyas par gyur da pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las tha rad pa bzhin du/ 'byor dpa gang gas bcom
328b7(mdo): ldan 'das kyi thod cu 'ongs pa'i 'byor da pa de nyid kyis// de nyid kyi mtshan mo rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i nged du song nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas te// rgyal po bslang nas/ 'odadi skad
328b8(mdo): skad ces smras so// rgyal po char po yongs nyas te mi bya// de nas rgyal po des de 'od chen po de dang lani bu de mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang dga' zhings su ste/ khyod su zhig ces dris so// de na me bdag sred
329a1(mdo): mos chas des bcom ldan 'das kyis skul gdug pa btul te shi nas// su bcu gsum pa 'i lha yul ba zang por skyes pa yin te/ bcom ldan 'das la yang bdag gis bsnyen bkur byas nas/ 
329a2(mdo): bden pa mthong bar gyurd to// de bdag gis khyod la bstand kyis/ khyod song la/ bskyed mos tshal de'i phyogs ga ge mo zhig nas// gter chen po byung la// bdag gi phyir bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge
329a3(mdo): 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol te/ yon gyi rabs kyang 'don par gsol cig/ de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos lhal bu sa nang myo zer bas khas blangs so// de nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur da pa'i
329a4(mdo): sgra'i mus/ rgyas pos cad kyi zer bas khas grangs par rig nas/ de nyid du myi snang bar gyur to// de nas rgyal po gzugs/ can snying pos// de nyid kyi mtshan mo// ul ma kA tA'i po brang 'khor
329a5(mdo): kyi myi dang / yus kyi rnams la bsgonas/ bskyed mos chos dam sa ste/ kati byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang ba ma sa/ rtswa la gsug gi ser du gags gsos te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhum
329a6(mdo): tha/ bcom ldan 'das sngon sprul gdug par gyu rang ba'i/ lha'i bus las gang dag bgyis na/ des spus gadrug par skyes lags/ las gang dag pagyis na des lha'i nang bu skyes te/ bden pa mthong bar gyur da lags/ btsud ldan
329a7(mdo): 'das kyis bkal sa me pa/ des gas cher chags pa bskyed de/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / sdug cing phongs pa dang / bkren pa rnams la sa nga pa' sems bskyed pa des na// sbrul gdug par skyes so// pas sems
329a8(mdo): dgal bar byas pa des ni lha'i nang du skyes so// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung ka ring sa dge bsnyen du gyu rad te// skyabs su song pa dang / bslab pa'i gzhi blangs pa des ni// bden pa mthong par gyur da to// 
329b1(mdo): rgyal po chen po de bas so ma sna spang ba'i phyir ba thon pam bya ste/ mi nas sprul par gyur pa'i nyes pa de lta bu dag 'byung bar mya 'gyur la dang / de nyid lha'i bur gyur da pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs de lta bur 'gyur ba
329b2(mdo): rgyal po chen po khyod kyis bslab par bya'o// de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de rjes su yi ring nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'go boste phyag
329b3(mdo): 'tshal nas/ stan las langs nas song ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka las yang nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ macom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 
329b4(mdo): zla ba zhes bya ba ni // // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pa/ rgyal po rnams dang / blo na po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brab 'khor gyi myi
329b5(mdo): rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / s+than mas dang / klu rnams dang // gnod sbyin rnams dang / lham na rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mya'im mi rnams dang / 
329b6(mdo): lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas// mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nas mkha' lding dang / myo'am me pa/ lto 'phye chen po rnams
329b7(mdo): kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa// na bzal dang / zhes zas dang / ka thams cha dang / gdan dang / spyan gsos dang / span zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan
329b8(mdo): thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa// mnyan kyi yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag 'gon myed zas sbyin gi kun dka' ra pa ma bzhugs so// de la ma ma nyan du yong ba na/ bral ze zhing pa zhig 'du
330a1(mdo): pa des// rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig tu che zhing dag las dka' mgur spyod do// de che zhing dag las dgal mgur myong ba las// chung ma las bu chags nas/ de zla ba
330a2(mdo): brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang / pu khyA ba ste/ khye'u gzugs/ zhing bsta na stu ga a mdzes pa/ skye bo thams cad kyi myo ge sim par byed pa btsas so// de yang bram ze des dka' bas rnyed pa yon te/ de la pu dang butra
330a3(mdo): mo gzhan yang myed nas/ de bskyed pasrings te/ cher skyes nas/ 'jig rten thams cad sim par byed pa'i phyir/ bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis khye'u de'i myong zla ba zhes btags so// de nas bram
330a4(mdo): ze'i khye'u zla bas grong khyer thams cad du brgyugs te/ bskor bas dbram ze de yang khye'u de la lhag par byams par gyur pa te 'chag pa dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dag gi tshe dang rtag tu legs
330a5(mdo): bar srung pa lhur byed tsa pe 'dug go// bram ze'i khyim yang / khyi ma bdag 'gon myed zas sbyin dang // nye bzhog na 'dug go// de nas bram ze de 'i khye'u de khyim bdag 'gon myed zas sbyin dang/ 
330a6(mdo): bsten nas rgyal bu rgyas khyed kyi tshal du song ste/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung thos nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed do// de yang tshe zung ste/ shinas sum brgya rtsa gsum pa'i lha/ yul 'am
330a7(mdo): por skyes so// lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas rib po ma lon pa ni// chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas sho'i phos/ kang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas
330a8(mdo): phyims shi'i'aphos pa dang / sum brgya rtsa gsum pa'i ste yul pa thang mar skyes pa dang / bcom ldas 'das la sems dgal bar gyur par des mthong ngo // de nas sdong bam er gyur pa'i sgo'i bu 'di
330b1(mdo): snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas bzod/ bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag go cha ma yon gas/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir/ 'gro'o snyam
330b2(mdo): mo// de nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lce'i chu/ rna chag tul dkor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/ lus de shal dang / se mo dos brkyar ba/ nor bu sna tshogs kyis brgya dad pa'i cod pan ca
330b3(mdo): lus gur gum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / sIka ka las brdzogs pas byugs pa des/ de nyid kyi mtshan po lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma kar
330b4(mdo): dang / man de ra ba rnams kyis thub bkang ste/ rgyal bu/ rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gos gtor te/ 
330b5(mdo): chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dugago// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon bram zer gyuradapa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khas
330b6(mdo): dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nasa'aphags pa'i 'dan pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i ske'i bus/ 'jig tshogs pa
330b7(mdo): lta ba'i ro'i che mo mthon po nyi shu e shes rdo rjes bcom nas// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas// dgal ba'i tshig ldan gsum brjod de/ btsun la bcom ldan 'das kyis
330b8(mdo): bdag gi khrag dang / mchi mo'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bskam pa dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang tha rad pa'i sgo rjes phye ba dang / bdag lha dang myi nos kyi nang du 'dag pa 'di
331a1(mdo): lta bu ni / bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis// mas kyang ma bgyis// rgyas pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis// nang myo dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis// sngon gyi mtshun
331a2(mdo): rnams kyis kyang mkha kyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang mkha kyis lags so// ma smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngon songs ma// shi nad tu mya bzang khyod kyi mthu yis bcad// bsod nas
331a3(mdo): rab ldan mtho ris 'gro po phye// / mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob// bdag gis da re pe nyes pa spangs pa'i myeg/ shin tu rnam dka khyod la brten nas thob// bdag mi sdug bsngal rgyas
331a4(mdo): pa'i med gas// 'phags pa dkris pa'i zho ba'i ko 'bang thog// gyi mchog dbapa po mye dang lhas mchod pa// skye dang ga pa 'ad spangs pa// srid pa stong dum ro ba dgal ba'i// chus
331a5(mdo): pa khyod na deng mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyang ba ka'agyur te// btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'ganas/ dgra thug ni bskor ba byas nas kyang / lho'i 'jig rten
331a6(mdo): Thaltas lha yul song / de nas sngon bram zer gyurd pa'i bu de/ tsho pa khye spogs phyi nad pa dang / zhing ba 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpal po g.yul las rgyas pa dang / nad pa nad thams cad las
331a7(mdo): tharang babazhin su/ 'byor du ba kang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi yang du 'ongs pa'i 'byor da pa de nyid kyis rab kyi gnas su so nga // dge slong dag ni grong dang sa rangs kyi nyal bar bzod pa sung med
331a8(mdo): bal gnas to// deng/ gis bcos ldan 'das kyi yang du sna ba chen po byung mazang ba// mamadunas kyang me rtsom skyes te// gangs rgyas pamam ldan 'das ma zhus pa/ bcom ldan dba'i
331b1(mdo): ma dang gsum myi mched kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha li dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong pa bzhi bcom ldan 'das sa blta ba'i slad du/ mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka
331b2(mdo): saHla dpa/ dge slong dag myi mched kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi de la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/ bram ze'i bu bu cog pa de tshe zung ste/ 
331b3(mdo): shi nas/ deng la sems dgal bar gyur da to// sus ban+d+ha rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas// de la dang sum pa'i thad du 'ongs te/ ngas de la chos bstan nas/ bden pa mthong bar gyur da te/ 
331b4(mdo): rang gi gnas su song ngo // de'i skabs su bram zes bu cag bsdu dag cing phangs la/ snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong ba dang / bzod pa dang ldan pa/ myi mthur pa myed pa de dur khrod du khyer nas
331b5(mdo): pang par bzhag ste/ kyi hud pu thu bo kyi hud bu cig pa zhes zerazhing 'bod do// de'i nye du rnams kyis re ltar bcugs kyi pa bslang bar ma nus nas/ de khA dang / chun lag dang bya rgod
331b6(mdo): dang / sa rnams kyisan bskor / bu myed sA bshig pa dag dang ni 'grogs/ skye bo yang 'os mi pa// zhi'i 'dug ko// de nas de'i bu s+thAm skyes pas/ pa ste sngags 'don pa mtho nas
331b7(mdo): snying bskyed de/ pha'i mya ngan bsal ba'i phyir/ bdag nyid drang srong gi cha lus su yul nas/ dur khrod kyi 'dab tu dka' thub lnga byed cing 'dug ko// de nas bram ze des/ drang srong de la dris pa/ 
331b8(mdo): kye drang srong chen po khyod dka' thub 'dis ci zhig sgrub// drang srong kis smras pa/ da di rgyal srid sgrub ste/ nga'i gser ki sho perta rin po che sna tshogs kyis smras pa/ nyi ma dang zla gnyis kyis shing rta
332a1(mdo): 'i 'khoms byas la/ 'jig rten slo ba bzhis mi mangs nas 'dre te/ shing rta la bano 'angs chen po 'di bskol bar 'dod do// zas zes smras pa/ gas te lo 'grumam pa'i bar// 
332a2(mdo): rgyu nad tu dka' thug s+yad byas te// dka' thub mchog gis s+yad byas kyang / gnas de khyod kyis re myi thob// drang srong kyis spras pa/ khyod kyang shi ba'i log pa mchog tu gnas zhing myo gtsa ba'i
332a3(mdo): rog pa 'dra bar gyur dra pa 'dis tsa zhog sgrub/ bram zhes smras pa/ stug pa'i bu cig pashi ste de sgrub bo// drang srong kas sbas pa// kal te lo brgya tham pa'o bar/ rgyud tu ngu ba'i las byas kyang
332a4(mdo): bu de khyod kyis re myi thob// khyod kyis dus kyang kyil bde nas bram ze de dang srong gi tshog bden no snyam nas da bste/ sa so// dad pa skyes nas khyod su zhig byas so// de nas ra
332a5(mdo): srong ka tshe lus de mya snang bar byas/ rang gi cha lugs su 'dug ste pa la smras pa/ bdag ni khyod kyi bu tshig padA yin te/ bcom ldan 'das la sems dkal bar gyur nas
332a6(mdo): ste/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i sku yul bzang por skyes nas khyod kyis mya ngan bsal ba'i phyir 'dir 'ongs so// yang khyod tshur spyod/ bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su bzhad cig dang / khyod kyang lan
332a7(mdo): pa las 'dal bar 'gyur kyang srid do// de nas bram ze des shi ba'i rus bu khor nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos la
332a8(mdo): ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi skyon sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis des 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad de/ de thos nas bram / 
332b1(mdo): des 'jig tsho gas la lta ba'i ri'i waM mo mthon po nyi shus rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo// de nas mtho bar 'gyur ba thob cing / rnyed pa thob nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la go pos bya/ 
332b2(mdo): 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas song ngo // de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu 'das 'di ltar pha'i
332b3(mdo): mya ngan bsal nas/ bden pa mthong ba yang bzhag pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalas la ba// dge slong dag de ltar 'dis bden pa mthong nas/ pha yongs su bskyabs pa 'di la ngo mtshar che
332b4(mdo): brtsi yod/ 'dis mi 'das pa'i dus na so so skye bor 'dug pa'i rtsa yang / pha bsad pa la thug pas lan gsum skyabs byas te de ye// sra bar rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas bshad do// dge slong
332b5(mdo): dag sngon byung pa 'das pa'i dus na / grong khyer pa ra na si na/ gzhan gyi chung ma la khyi byed pa zhig yod de/ de li bu ni dad pa dang / ldan la/ dge zhing bas pa bzang ba/ mye rnams shin tu 'drang pa zhig
332b6(mdo): de nas re zhig na/ de phas rkun po byas nas/ rgyal pos gshed ma rnams gshed ma rnams la sod cig ces pasgo'o// de nas lus san gsum gyi bar du rgyal po sa gsol nas/ srog phangs pa byin mo// bcom ldan
332b7(mdo): 'das kyis bka las la dpa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gzhan gi chung ma la gyi byed pag pa yin pa de ni bram ze 'di yin no// byi byed pa'i bu de ni bram ze'i khye'u 'di yin no// 
332b8(mdo): dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das las mi zhog bgyis na/ nges pa dang bu gnyi ga bden pa mthong bar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalas khad pa/ yang dag par rdzogs
333a1(mdo): pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung ga ring la// gnyi ga dge bsnyen du gyur da te/ skyabs su song ba dang / bsrab pa'i gzhi blangs pa na// de'i phyir da ltar bden pa mthong bar gyur to// dge slong dag de bas
333a2(mdo): na/ 'du byed thams cad myi rtag pa dang / chos thams cad bdag myed pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o snyam du mya ngan las 'das pa la 'bad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das
333a3(mdo): kyis de skad ces bkal saH la nas// dge slong de dag dang / sA dang / lA ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang // myi 'am mi dang / lto 'phye chen po la sortogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ macom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
333a4(mdo): thal mngon par bstod do// / sa zhes bya ba ni// / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la// rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen
333a5(mdo): po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gi myi rnam sa dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / s+ya/ mas dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnaMm
333a6(mdo): dpa/ nam mkha' lding rnams dang / myi'am ci rnams dang / sto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha
333a7(mdo): sdang dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa// na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / ka dan dang / snya
333a8(mdo): gsos dang / sman zong rjes brnyes pa// nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyas bu rgyas byed kyi tshal khyim bdag 'gon myed pas sbyin gyi kun rka ra pa na bzhugs so// de'i tshe mnyan tu
333b1(mdo): yad thams ma mchog pa zhes bya ba'i dus stor byung ste/ der srog chags 'bum khrag tu ma 'dus nas/ shings la'i me tog blangs te/ me zhing dgalas dgal nu myong ngo // de nas rtseni rganag mo nga banan
333b2(mdo): bu mo zhig gas sa la'i me tog blangs te/ mnyan du yod pa'i nang du so pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyang dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham 'ape byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du pa dang nas mnyan du yod
333b3(mdo): bar bsod snyoms mdzad de/ slar gshegs nas// bu mo des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum khucu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa// dpe byad bza po brgyad nus mdzes
333b4(mdo): bar byas pa// 'od 'dom gang gyis brgyand pa/ nyi ma stong dbas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba// rin po che'i ro bo 'gro ba sta bya kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang dga' ba skyes te/ 
333b5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das la sa la li me tog gis gtor to// de nas pa com ldan 'das la khaskor ba byas te phyi re log nas/ khyim du dgos pa'i phyir yang / gzhan dag kyang blang ngo snyam kha dang / re shig
333b6(mdo): na des la'i shing la 'jog pa las lbu ste sha nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bsnyam pakum byas pas/ sum bcu cha gsum pa'i lce yul bza pamaskyes so// de nas reg ka na pus dang gnas myed 'das sa
333b7(mdo): tog gos brgya dad te/ lha'i mdun ma nang du song // de 'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang / lha'i mdum sa chos bzangs na/ sgra'i tshogs kyi nang na/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod
333b8(mdo): cing 'dug pa sas/ sgra'i dab po la rgya byin gyis// grwa'i bum lus dang gzhas byed 'das ma'i mi ton gyis brgyan pa/ dag pa'i maba'ab ba mazang ngo // mthong nas kyang de satshigs su bcad de smras pa/ kyi
334a1(mdo): phyir khyod kyi lus mdog dag pa'i gser 'dra pad ma ud pal lta bur gyur pa// 'di na lus dpal mtshungs myed khyod kyi lus las 'od byung 'di dag mi les gyur // ci'i phyir na khyod kyo bzhin mdog pad ma rgyas
334a2(mdo): 'drag ser mdog lta bur gyur // sas rnams gang gis 'bras bu myong 'gyur 'di ni lha mo khyod kyis bdag la spros// lha mos smras pa// mtshan mchog dag gis rgyas pa'i// mya'o nyo ma nyan thos bcas/ su ma'i me to/ 
334a3(mdo): rdul myed pa// bzang po dag gis legs par gtor/ las dge de 'dra byas pa'i byor/ bdag ma ga par mngon du mdzes// bzhini mdog pad ma zla la ltar/ rnam dag 'od ltar ltan sdug/ brgya byin gyis smras pa
334a4(mdo): rgyam yon tan nyid kyi zhong / nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs pa mtho ris sdug par skye ba'i phyir// de la khyod kyis sa bon btab// bzhin mdzes pad ma'i 'dab ma yangs pa lta bu'i myog ldan pa/ 
334a5(mdo): byad myed mchog rnams kyis ni gang la bkur sti byas pa'i// sangs rgyas pad ma rgyas pa'o 'dapa yangs 'dra ba'i s+yan/ mngal ba// gser mchog phung po lta bur mdangs dkar de la
334a6(mdo): su myi mchod// lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas// ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi'i phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas
334a7(mdo): rmi khas shi 'phos pa dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang po bskyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pas de mthong ngo // de nas sba'i bu mo de 'di snyam gyi sems te/ bdag ldan
334a8(mdo): lon nas bzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i byor 'gro ba ni bdag gyi tshe ma yin gyis/ bdag/ zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyirare 'gro'o snyam mo// de nas lha'i bu morna chag dub dkor dag ni
334b1(mdo): 'grus pa thogs pa/ sus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu ride po che sna tshogs kyis brgya nad pa'i cod pan can/ yus kur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang / s+phog ka las sogs pas byugs pa de
334b2(mdo): lha'i bu mo 'bum phrag du mas g.yog byas nas// de nyid kyi mtshan mo sa la lo me tog gi gzhal myed khang de nyid dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi thed du song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis
334b3(mdo): gtor te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu mo de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'phags pa'i bde/ 
334b4(mdo): ba bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bsta dang te/ de tho sa nas lha'i bu mo des 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri lo che mam then po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyud tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
334b5(mdo): bu tho ba ste/ des bden pa mthong nas/ dgal ba'i tshog san/ sum du brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis khang/ gi khrag dang / mchi ma'i skyematsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i sa
334b6(mdo): bskal ba dang / ngan song kyi sgo rnams bcad la dang / mtho ris dpatha rang pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang / gyi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni/ bdags pas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma
334b7(mdo): bgyis ga rgyas pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis// nang myi dang gnyen gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis// sngon gyi mtshun rnaMs kyis kyang ma mgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags
334b8(mdo): so// yang smras pa// nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song las// shi nad tu mi bzang khyod kyi mthu yise bcad// bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phyed// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag kyis thob/ 
335a1(mdo): sha bdag gise da 'i nga nyes pa spangs pa'i phyin/ gshi ring tungam dang khyod sa brten ngas thob// bdag ni drug pasngas rgyal mon pongs gas/ ka'aphags par ces pa ni pa'i gapo'amaman za kyis cag dbang po lpa dang mis mthod pa/ 
335a2(mdo): skye dpa rka pa' rtsi ba na spangs pa// srid pa stong du mthong bar dkal ba'i// thub pa khyod ni deng mtho 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyang ba dag 'gyur te// btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas// dgra thub la
335a3(mdo): ri skor ba byas nas kyang // spa'i 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul song // de nas lha'i bu mo de tshong pa khye spogs phyind pa dang // zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur da pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las
335a4(mdo): mthar pa bzhin du/ 'byor dpa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du'o/ rangs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo // dge slong drag ni srod dang tho rangs myi nyes khar brtson pa skur byed pa la gnas te/ de
335a5(mdo): ngag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po 'byung ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang the tsom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ ma dang gsum myi mched kyi
335a6(mdo): bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ sgo'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags samA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka las \u0f7fsa pa// myi mched kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ 
335a7(mdo): lha'i dbang po brgya byin nas/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhing la blta ba'i phyil 'ongs pa ma yin no// bu mo gang gis lam kar me tog gis gtor ba de khyod kyis mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so// de ni de la so
335a8(mdo): dka' ba skyes nas zhi ste/ sum bcu ca gsum pa'i ste yus bzang por skyes nas de nga'i byed du 'ongs te/ ngas de la chos bstan nas// bded pa mthong bar gyur pa te// rang kyi gnas su so pa 'o// dge grom
335b1(mdo): dag de la gda'adi ltar bslab par bya ste/ ston dpa la bkur sti bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mo bya'o// mchod pa bya'o// ston pa la bku sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo byas// mchod pa byas nas/ brten
335b2(mdo): te gnas khar bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' saHyang nas// dge slong de dag yi 'ongs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
335b3(mdo): bstod do// bam po bcu gsum pa// dpal ldan ma zhes bya ba ni// / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang // 
335b4(mdo): mchen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi da kyi rnams dang / tshong dper rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / sgra rnams dang / rgyarna mas dang / gnod skyid rnams dang / lha ma yin
335b5(mdo): rnams dang / nam mkha' sde rnams dang / phyi'am mi rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bra mar byas/ ri mo byas// mchod pa byas ste/ swa dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang
335b6(mdo): lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding pa dang / myi 'am mi dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa// na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims
335b7(mdo): cha dang / ka dan dang / sUn ka sos dang / smad zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka yang ka gnas pa na rten tsape bzhugs so// de la tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi rgong
335b8(mdo): khye margyal po gzugs can snying po rgyal po byed de/ de'i ringal 'byor da pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde la dang / so legs pa dang / skye bo dang / myo mang pos gang ba dang / bzod pa dang / 'thab pa zhi pa dang / la drug pa dang
336a1(mdo): rang la zug dang / chos rgyam dang / mya ke dang / nad rnams byed pa da / 'bras sa kyu dang / khru sa sho dang / bas pa dag ma nye nga ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa khyed cing// choms dkrugs pa/ 
336a2(mdo): pu ga las bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyang so// de nas gang gi tshe rgyal po gzugs nan snying pos// bcom ldan 'das las bden pa mthong pa de'i tshe/ btsun mo'i 'khom dab bcas te/ dus la sum du bcom ldan
336a3(mdo): 'das kyi theng du 'gro'o// de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po/ phyi zhi ge ra pyid kyi dus la bab pa'i tshe shing ljon pa rnams me tog rgyas la / ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ne tse dang / ri skyes dang / 
336a4(mdo): byug dang ka gang gang de'u rnams skad 'byid pa'i nags khrod dang bskyed mas tshal gyi ser/ btsun me dam 'a dang / btsun mo'i kho dab zanas te dong nas// des btsun mo 'khor gyos rgyas khos/ 
336a5(mdo): gsom pa lha bdag cag ni gdugs cig bzhin tu/ bcomaldan 'das kyi thad du mchi ba'i rngo myi thog na/ lha btsun mo rna 'khor gyi nang 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu sgo dang / sen
336a6(mdo): 'i mchod rten pa phigs te/ zhal bsro bar cig nang/ 'on dang bdag cag gis de la rgya nang tu mar med dang / 'dug pa dang / me tog dang / spos dang / me tog 'breng dang / thug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
336a7(mdo): ba dan ngag gos bkur sti bkye'o zhes gsol to// de nas re zhigs/ rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das la gsel ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la dbu skra dang sen mo gsal// phyug sol// 'onang
336a8(mdo): bdag giso mchis srang 'khor du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten brtsigs te zhal bsro bar bgyi'o zhes gsol do// de nas re shig na bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dbu skra dang sen mo khyen nas/ rgyal po
336b1(mdo): gzugs can snyi be bo btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pas/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bkur sti chen po dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten bathigs te/ zhas bsros nas
336b2(mdo): la btsun mo 'khor gyis mar me dang / bcug pa dang / ma hos dang / spos dang / me tog 'theng dang / byug pa dang / gzugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang ba de dag kyis kyang mchod pa byed do// de ngas gang gi tshe rgyal po bskyes swa lha sbyin gyis spang de
336b3(mdo): yab chos dang ldan pa chos bzhin du rgyal po byed pa bsad nas/ rang rgyal por zhugs pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstadad pa ya/ sbyin par bya ba'i chos thams cad bcad te/ su dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rtend la bkur sti mkhyed
336b4(mdo): cig ces kyang khrims bcas so// de nas gang gi tshe tshes bco lnga la skabs 'dabyed pa'i dus la bab pa de'i tshe/ dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rte nad de sa su yang phyag dar byed pa 'am/ mar me dang / gdug pa dang / me tog 'brus
336b5(mdo): ba byed do// de nas btsun mo 'khor gyis dbu sgra dang / sen po'i mchod rten de de ltar gyu pa yang mabong ngo // rgyal po gzugs car snying po yang dra mangs// snying rje rje skad du zhing / kyi hung chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po dang bral
336b6(mdo): bas/ bdag cag bsod nabs las 'gribs so zhes mdzer to// de'i nang nas btsun mo dpal ldan ma zhes bya ba des rang gi srog dang bsngos te/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su drar ras/ dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten la phyag dar byas te/ 
336b7(mdo): sar me'i 'phreng pa mang rang to// de nas me shig/ ra/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra/ khang pa ba rtsegs pa'i steng du byu ba ste/ sna ba chen po de mthong nas/ 'pho mo zhig ces dris pa dang / re zhig na gzhan zhig gis dpal ldan mas dbu skra dang sem mo'i mchod
336b8(mdo): rten la/ mar me'i 'breng ba dngang nga pa lags so zhes byas so// de nas dpal ldan ya/ bkug ste// ci'i phyir khyod kyis rgyal po'i bkal bcag ces rmas ras// de na re bdag gis bka' ba cag tu lags kyang / bdag gis chos dang ldan pa'i rgyas / 
337a1(mdo): gzugs can snying po'i bka las bcag go// zhes zer lo// de nas de khros nas 'khor lo 'phangs te bsad do// de bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyu rad te shinas/ sum bcu yA gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes
337a2(mdo): so// de'i tshe b+ha'i mdun ma zhig kyang 'dus nas/ lha'i bu mo dpal ldanar ma/ lha'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor snang ba kho ra khor yug dpag tshad gcig yod pa dang ldan te/ lha li ma dun ma'i neng du song ngo po// de nas lha'i dbang ngo brgya byin gis
337a3(mdo): sna pa pa chen po de dang/ lha'i 'od dpag tshad gcig pa mthong nas dris pa// ci phyir khyod kyi lus mdog dag pa'i gser 'dra pad ma ud pal lta bur gyur da/ 'di na lus dpal mtshungs myed khyod kyi lus las 'od byu ba 'di dag mi sa sa stu
337a4(mdo): ci'i phyir ma khyod kyi bzhin mdog pad ma rgyas 'dra gser mdog lta bur gyur/ las rnams gang gis 'bras bu myong gyur nga 'di ni lha po khyod kyis bdag la smos// lha mos smras pa/ 'jig rten gsum 'gon 'gro/ 
337a5(mdo): pa'i sgron cig pa/ mtshan mchog rnams kyis phyug pa'i sangs rgyas mthong spra mchog nyon mongs mur pa sem dpal/ mun pa selang pa'i marame yon du phul/ zla ba'i 'od zer mdog dpe 'dra ba'i 'od/ mthong ma
337a6(mdo): thub pa snying nas dad pa bskyed/ 'od zer mthong nas dka' bar gyur da pa yis// stond pa smra ba ldi pacho ga la phyag kyang ma gyis// las dge de 'dra byas pa'i phyir/ bdag ni lhag par mngon du mdzes// bzhin mdog pad ma zla ba ltar
337a7(mdo): rnam dag 'od ldan pa ltan stug/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ kye sa yon tan nyid kyi zhing // nyes pa thams cad rnam par spangs pa// mtho ris sdug par skye ba'i phyirang/ de la khyod kyis sa bon btab/ bzhin mdzes pad ma'i 'dab
337a8(mdo): ma yangs pa 'dra ba'i myig ldan ma/ bud myed mchog rnaMs kyis ni gang la bkur sti byas pa'i// sangs rgyas pad ma rgyas pa'i 'dab yangs 'dra ba'i spyan mngal ba// gser mchog phung po lta bur mdangs kar de oM su myo mchod/ 
337b1(mdo): lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos// gang du skyes// las gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas myi las shi 'phos pa dang / sum bcu
337b2(mdo): rtsa gsum kha'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dka' bar gyur pa de mthong ngo // de nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag yon nas bzod bcom ldan 'das la ba
337b3(mdo): pa'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi tshe ma yin gyis// bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo// de nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma/ lha'i 'od kyi sdang bas gang ba des// de nyid mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud
337b4(mdo): pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ti dang / pad ma kar po dang / man da na depa rnams kyis// thub bkang ste// rgyal po'i khab bya ka lad pa/ ka gnas pa thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas// bcom ldan
337b5(mdo): 'das la me tog gis gtor to// chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'angs kyisaspyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis swA 'i bu mo dpal ldan ma 'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang
337b6(mdo): rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden po bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ dathos nas lha'i bu mo dpas ldan mas// 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthong po nyi shu/ ye shes
337b7(mdo): rdo rjes btsam nas rgyud do tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bded pa mthong nas/ dka' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskabs pa/ 
337b8(mdo): dang / rus pa'i sa bskal pa dang / ngam song na sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang pa rang ba'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang kyi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu da/ bdag la pas kyang tha ba kyis sa
338a1(mdo): ma bgyis// rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis// sgra rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis ka nang myi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis// sngon gyi mtshud kyis kyang ma bgyis// dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis
338a2(mdo): lags so// yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang po ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ shin tu myi bzad khyod kyi mtho'i sa btsad/ bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yod bdag kos thob// bdag
338a3(mdo): gyis di ro nga nyes pa spangs pa'i myog/ shi nad tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob/ bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal// 'phags pa dges pa zhi pa li ko 'pha thob/ mya mchog dbang po lha dang myis mchod pa
338a4(mdo): skye dang rga dpa'achi ba'i nad spangs pa/ srid pa stong su ma thong bar dka' 'a 'i/ thub pa khyod ni dang mthob 'bras bu yong // de nas do/ rab 'byung ba dga' gyur te// btud cing zhabs gnyis la mi phyag 'tshal na/

338a6(mdo): sas rgyal ba dang// nad pa nang thams cad byang ba bzhin dru/ 'byor pa gang gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad tu 'ongs pa'i 'byor de pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo // dge slong dag ni srong dang tho rangs kyi nyal bam/ 
338a7(mdo): brtson pa skur byed pa sa gnas te// de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang the tsom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa// bcom ldan 'das kyi lag
338a8(mdo): ma dang gsum mi mched kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am// lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi'o// bcom ldan 'das lta ba'i slad dru// mchis pa ma lags sam// / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka las lang
338b1(mdo): dge slong dag myi mched kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam// 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi/ nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yo gyi/ rgyal po gzugs cad snying po'i btsun mo dpal ldan ma zhes bya
338b2(mdo): bag rang gi srog dang bsngos te/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran nas// de bzhin gshegs pa li dbu sgra dang / sem po'i mchod rten la mar me'i 'phreng ba dang nas// rgyal po ma skyes dgra khros pas bsad de/ 
338b3(mdo): de pa la dga' ba'i sems skyes nas shi ste// sum bcu gsum pa'i lce yul tu bzang por skyes nas// de mdang gsum pa'i thad du 'ongs ste/ ngas de la chos bstan nas bden pa mthong bar gyur da te/ rang gi gnas
338b4(mdo): su song ngo // dge slong dag de bas na/ 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ stond pa la bkur sti bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// ma dad par bya'o// stonang pa la bkur sti byas/ tha mar byas/ ri mor byas/

338b6(mdo): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// goso// zhes bya ba ro// / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la// rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / 
338b7(mdo): phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi myo rnams dang / cho dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / sgra rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / 
338b8(mdo): kyilam mirna ngas dang / lto 'bya chen po rnams rgyas/ bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ mim byas/ mtshang pa byas te/ sde dang / kludang / gni skyon dang / sal yin dang / rnam sa pa' snga'i dang / gyi'am ci nga / 
339a1(mdo): lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhas zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / 
339a2(mdo): sman song rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa// mnyan du yod pa ma/ rgyal bu rgyas byed kyi tshel khyim bdag 'gon myed zas sbyin gyi kun dga'ar ba/ bzhugs so// de nas gang gi tshe khyim
339a3(mdo): bdag 'gon myed zas sbyin gyis sangs rgyas las 'thogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la// rgyal bu rgyal gyi chol phul te/ mthar gyis gser bye ba phrag brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la phul pa de'i tshe
339a4(mdo): de'i blo skyes pa// ma la bdag sbyin pa dag byed zhing bsod nams dag byed pa 'di lta bu la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod kyis bdag gis ste bo dbul po rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ mnyam du yod pa dkar+tha
339a5(mdo): ba'i skye bo rnams dad pa bsdus te/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bsnyen bkur bya'o// de ltar byas kyang skye bo mang po la yang phan gdags par 'gyur la/ bsod
339a6(mdo): nams mang po yang bskyed par 'gyur ro snyam mo// de nas khyim bdag 'akon myed zas sbyin gyis ji ltar bsams pa de rgyal po la gsol nas/ rgyal pos kyang mnyan du yod pa thams cad du dril bsgrags te/ 
339a7(mdo): mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i pho brang 'khor kye myo khyed rnams nyon cig/ deng nas zhag bdun dang / khyim bdag 'gon myed zas sbyin gas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos rnams kyi phyir/ glang po che la zhon te/ 
339a8(mdo): dad pa sdud par 'dod kyis// khyed gang kas ji tsam yongasu btang bar bya ba de yongasu btang par gyis shig ces bsgo'o// de nas re shig na zhag 'dun lon pa dang / khyim bdag 'gon myed pas sbyin glang po che la zhon te// de bzhin
339b1(mdo): gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams kyi phyir/ dang ba srung ba la zhugs te/ der gang dag la ci tsem bdog pa de tsam sbyin par byed de/ kha cig ni 'gul gi mdo sbyin pam byed / kha cig ni gsu bu spong bar byed/ Sha sheni dpung kyar byed par byed / 
339b2(mdo): kha cig ni zhe mer gi 'phreng ba sbyin par byed/ kha cig no sor gdub kyi rgyan sbyin par byed// kha cig ni mu tig ki do shal spyi bar byed/ kha cig ni ka ser sbyin par bye dang / kha cig ni dngul sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni tha ma zho'i brgyad ca tsam yang sbyin pa byed/ 
339b3(mdo): ngo// khyim kha dag de yang gzhan la phan gdags pa'i phyir le nad par byed do// de nas re shog na bud myed shi nad tu dbul mo zhig gise sha thang ste/ zla ba gsum gis ras yug cig rnyed nas/ des ras yug de khyon de srang du zhugs pa dang / des
339b4(mdo): khyim kha dag 'gon myed zas sbyin dung 'brud cing // rnga zlum gdung bzhin tu/ rgyang nas 'ong ba mthong nas// des dge bsnyen zhig la dris pa ji ste khyim bdag 'di phyug cing nor ma nga la/ yongs spyod che ste// gtem sa'i 'og tu sbas
339b5(mdo): ba rnams kyang mthong ma/ ci'i phyir na 'di gzhan gyi khyos nas skor zhi slob bar byed ces bya ba dang / dge bsnyed len re/ gzhan la phan kadas ba'i phyir/ gang dag bcom ldan 'das// nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bca
339b6(mdo): ba kha shos gsol myi nus pa de dag gi don du phan 'dogs par byed de/ ci nas mang po spongs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'bul tu 'jug go// zhes zer ro// de ras bu mo de'i blo skyes pa/ 'o ma bdag ni bsod nams ma byas pa yin sa
339b7(mdo): bdag cig pus bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge dang bcas pa/ bshos gsol ba'i mthu bdag la myed kyis/ bdag gis 'di cung zad dbul ba bya kor ma chag snyam mo// de nas bdag nyid la mi bdog ces palta na yang / ras yug cig
339b8(mdo): ma gtogs pa/ gzhan mi leb sa mthong ste/ des pa sems pa gal te bdag 'di na 'dug bzhin du ras 'di phu la ma ni/ bdag ga cer bur byung kis// bdag khang thog tu song la/ ras dor mo snyam mo// de nas de khang 'og tu song nas// rang gi su/ 
340a1(mdo): las ras phud te/ khyim bdag 'gon myed zas sbyin gyi steng tu bor ba dang / khyim bdag des kyang 'phrigs te 'dis khang thog nas bor ba las na// 'di la nor de las byed go ma chag snyam nas/ rang gi g.yog/ rnams bsgo
340a2(mdo): kha/ khyed de la ras 'di sus bom pa ltos shig ces byas nas/ de dag gis bltas pa dang / re shig dbud myed de cog no// 'dug pa 'thong ngo // de nas de dag gis dris pa dang / de ma me bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan brjod pa bdag gis thos rba
340a3(mdo): dbul ba'i 'jigs pas skrag ste/ bdag gise gos rnyed pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pa las bsogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul lo zhes zer ro// de nas de dag gis khyim bdag 'gon myed zas sbyin la byas so// de nas khyim pas/ 
340a4(mdo): 'gon myed zas spyir mchog tu ngo mtshar tu gyur da nas/ bu mo de la gos dang rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs bskom to// de nas de'i tshe thungs ste shi nas// sumya brdza ma gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes te// skyes ma thag tu lha'i bu dang / 
340a5(mdo): lha'i bu mo gzhan su la yang myed pa/ de lta bu'i gos dag de la byung ngo / lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lor pa dag ni/ chos nyid kyi/ sa sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi/ 'phos// gang du skyes
340a6(mdo): las gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas myi las shi 'phos pa dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum kha'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rab tu phul pa des mthong ngo // de mthong nas sngon ras 'bul 'bul ba'i lha'i bu mo// 
340a7(mdo): na cha gdu pa dkor dag cing 'gul pa thogs pa/ lus do shal dang / se mo ngas brgya nad pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgya nang pa'i cod pan nam/ sus gur gum dang tam la'i lo ma dang / sprig ka la stsogs pas byugs pa des de nyi
340a8(mdo): kyi mtshan mo// lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma kar po dang / man da ra ba rnams kyis zhu ba bkang ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshil thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das
340b1(mdo): la mnan nas gtor / chos pa nyam pa'i phyir / bcom ldan 'das kyi phyin sngar 'dug go// dengs bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon ras 'phrul 'phrul ba'i su su pa'i bsam pa dang / bkas nyas dang // mas dang / rang bdin
340b2(mdo): thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa li bde pa lan rtogs par 'gyur la de lta bu'i chos bstan to// de thos nas sdod ras 'bul 'bul ba'i lha'i bu mos/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ro'i rtse mo mam na po nyi shus/ rdo rjes
340b3(mdo): bcom nas / rgyur tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas// dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang / mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / 
340b4(mdo): rus pa'i e bsgral pa dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang tha rad pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag sna dang / myi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu/ bdag la phas kyang ma
340b5(mdo): bgyis// mas kyang ma kha gyis/ rgyal pos kyang mkha kyis// nang rgya dpag nyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnam sa kyis kyang ma bkyis lags so// yang smras pa// nyes pa mang po
340b6(mdo): sngam pa 'i ngan song lam/ shin tu myi ba zang khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/ bsod nams rab ldan mtho ras 'gro ba phye// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/ bdag gse ring nyes pa spang ba'i phyig// shin
340b7(mdo): rkyernam dag/ khyod la brten nas thob/ bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgas// 'phags pa dges pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob// myi mchog dbang po mya dang lhas mchod pa// skye dang dka' dpa' chi ba'i na
340b8(mdo): spangs pa/ srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba'i// thub pa khyod na de mthong 'bras bu yod/ de nas do shal 'phyang ba dka' gyur da te// btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/ dgra thub la ni bsgo
341a1(mdo): pa byas nas kyang / s+tha'i 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul song // de nas sngon ras 'bul 'bul ba'i lha mo de/ tshe po pa khye spogs phyi nad pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur da pa dang / dpa'o / g.yul las rgyal ba dang / 
341a2(mdo): da pa nad thams cad las tha rad pa bzhin du/ 'byor da pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zad du 'ongs pa'i/ 'byorarod pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo // dge slong dag ni srong dang tho rangs myi nyal bar ba thon pa
341a3(mdo): lhur byed pa la gnas ste/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du sngam pa chen po byung ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kya the tshom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das mi lags/ 
341a4(mdo): mdapa gsum myi mched kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/ lha'i dbang po/ brgya byin nas/ 'jig rten skyong pa bzhi bcom ldan 'das la lta ba'i slad du mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyiso bka
341a5(mdo): saHla dpa/ dge slong dag gyi mched kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi pa la lta la phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/ ras 'bul 'bul ba'i bud myed de/ 
341a6(mdo): khyim kha dag 'gon myed zas sbyin dad pa sdud par byed pa la ras phul nas shi ste/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul ba zang por skyes nas// de mdang gsum nga'i thad du 'ongs// ngas de la chos bstan nas/ 
341a7(mdo): bden pa mthong bar gyur da te// rang gi gnas su song ngo // dge slong dag de bsan 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun rnams la bkur sti bya'o// bkur sti myed par phye bya'o// 
341a8(mdo): zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' ma sa nas// dge slob de dag yi rings te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 
341b1(mdo): de na zhes bya ba di / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal brnabs dang / thod pa chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / kho bra 'khor gyi myi rnams dang / yong dman rnams dang / deng dpor rnams da
341b2(mdo): lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / kand sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding la/ kyi'am mi rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bku pa sti byas/ tha bar byas/ ri bo Sh+ya
341b3(mdo): mchod pa byas te/ lce dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lham yid dang // nam mkha' lding dang / gyi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod dom na
341b4(mdo): chen po dang ldan pa / na bapa' dang / zham zas dang / 'isadas dang // gdas dang / s+yAd gsos dang / sman rdzo rnam su rnyes pa/ nya thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ mnyan du yongs
341b5(mdo): nargyas bu rgyas byed kyi tshil khyim bdag 'gon byed smras kyi cis dang/ 'a bar b.lags so// de'i margyas pa'i 'ib kyi thob khyer na rgyas po gzugs can snying po rgyal po byed de/ de'i ris
341b6(mdo): 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / stong pa/ myi ma pos gang ba dang / zad pa dang / 'thab zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang / su ke dang / nad nas
341b7(mdo): myed pa dang / 'bras sa lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ba grang dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa myed cing / tsher ma dkrugs la/ bu cig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyas srid brkyangs so// rgyal pod
341b8(mdo): yang dad pa dang ldan pa/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang pa// gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje pa/ bdag nyid tshe ba// chos 'dod pa/ skye dgu la byams pa zhig go// de nas re shi ke na/ bcom ldan
342a1(mdo): 'das mthong bar smond te// lag pa la oM ma tshugs bcas nas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug go// de nas blon po rnams kyis smras pa// lha tsa'o slad du thugs ngan mdzad rgyal pos spras pa/ 
342a2(mdo): ngas bcom ldan 'das ring zhig ma mthong ngo // ngas bde bar gshegs pa rare zhig ma mthong ngo // da ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'dod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyin par gnas pa la bzhugs pa/ 
342a3(mdo): li snyan rnam par dag pa phyi las 'das pas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos smon lam gsad to// de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni// gyi mkhyedad pa 'am mi ga zigs pa 'am/ 
342a4(mdo): rtogs pa 'am ga thugs su myi chud pa ni yeng myed la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig rtenas phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa// srung pa gcig pa dang ldan pa

342a8(mdo): byang chub kyi yan lag bdud kyi me tog gos phyug pa/ lam yan lad brgyad pa ston pa/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dku la mazhes pa'i/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcur/ grags
342b1(mdo): pas kun tu rgyas pa brgya phrag bcu pas dbang byed pa bas kyang ched khyad par 'phags pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum dru / sangs rgyas kyi spyan kyis 'jig rten la gzigs te

343a7(mdo): spyod do// de nas ne tso gyi skad shes pa des rgyal po la smras pa// kye rgyal po khyod mkhyend par mdzod cig/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bces pa khyod kyi yul du gshegs ljags kyis
343a8(mdo): lha khyod kyis bshos sta gon mdzad pa'i rogs so zhes byas so// de nas rgyal po sha nang tu ringes par khakhung bzangs kyi steng nas babs nas blon po'i tshogs kyis zham nga byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
343b1(mdo): zadan pa thams nas// gtugs dang / rgyas mtshan dang / ba dan rnams dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / skye tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das bsu'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dag
